original: de nyid min zhes bya ba ni tshad ma dang cig shos nyid rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid min zhes bya ba ni tshad ma dang cig shos nyid rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit is not that‚Äù means that the valid cognition and the other are posited.

original: snang med 'gyur zhes bya ba ni la la'i bsam pas tshad ma ma yin pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma yin pa dang / gzhan dag rtogs pa las ni tshad ma yin pa de'i phyir der snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: snang med 'gyur zhes bya ba ni la la'i bsam pas tshad ma ma yin pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma yin pa dang / gzhan dag rtogs pa las ni tshad ma yin pa de'i phyir der snang ba ma yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit does not appear‚Äù means that for some, the cognition is not a valid cognition, and therefore it is not a reason. For others, it is a valid cognition, and therefore it does not appear to them.

original: ci las she na de ni zhes bya ba ni bsam @226a * //
analyzed: ci las she na de ni zhes bya ba ni bsam @226a * //
translated: From what? The phrase ‚Äúthat is‚Äù refers to the cognition.

original: pa'o // dngos rten min ni tshad ma la mi rten pa'i phyir dang rang nyid tshad ma ma yin pas 'gal ba'i phyir dang gcig nyid la tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'o // dngos rten min ni tshad ma la mi rten pa'i phyir dang rang nyid tshad ma ma yin pas 'gal ba'i phyir dang gcig nyid la tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a basis of reality because it is not based on valid cognition, because it is contradictory that it is not itself a valid cognition, and because it is contradicted by valid cognition in regard to the same object.üîΩThe cognition that arises from the words ‚Äúbecause it is produced‚Äù and ‚Äúbecause it is impermanent‚Äù is not a proof, like the direct perception that is based on the object that is established for the entire world.

original: skye ba'i phyir dang mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i shes pa'i ni 'jig rten thams cad la grub pa'i shes bya nye bar gzhag par byed pa'i mngon sum bzhin du sgrub par byed pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la don yod ces bya ba ste
analyzed: skye ba'i phyir dang mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i shes pa'i ni 'jig rten thams cad la grub pa'i shes bya nye bar gzhag par byed pa'i mngon sum bzhin du sgrub par byed pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la don yod ces bya ba ste
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit has a purpose‚Äù means that it is not a mere repetition of what has already been proven.

original: / mngon sum pa la sogs pa'i du ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: / mngon sum pa la sogs pa'i du ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The direct perception, etc. are smoke, etc.

original: med pa zhes bya ba ni rgol ba nyid kyis tshad ma ma yin pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa zhes bya ba ni rgol ba nyid kyis tshad ma ma yin pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The non-existent is that which the opponent himself has accepted as not being a valid means of knowledge.

original: de'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad kyis nges par gzung ba'i sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa 'di las bdag med par smra ba la gnod par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad kyis nges par gzung ba'i sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa 'di las bdag med par smra ba la gnod par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not correct to say that the assertion of selflessness is undermined by this recognition of what was previously seen, which is ascertained by all the world.

original: yang dag pa'i sgrub byed kyang bsgrub bya yin pa ni gang las ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba thams cad shes pa nyid la sogs pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la yod kyang zhes bya ba ste ;
analyzed: yang dag pa'i sgrub byed kyang bsgrub bya yin pa ni gang las ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba thams cad shes pa nyid la sogs pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la yod kyang zhes bya ba ste ;
translated: And the correct proof is the probandum, from which it is said, Is there anything that is not established by omniscience, etc.?

original: dngos po ma yin pa sgrub byed ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po ma yin pa sgrub byed ma yin pa'o //
translated: The non-existent is not a proof.

original: med pa rtogs dang mtshungs zhes bya ba ni sbrang ma'i tshogs la sogs pa las me rtogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: med pa rtogs dang mtshungs zhes bya ba ni sbrang ma'i tshogs la sogs pa las me rtogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: The line similar to the cognition of fire from a group of bees, etc. means that the cognition of fire from a group of bees, etc. is similar to the cognition of the non-existent.

original: de lta yin na thams cad shes pa nyid dang skad cig ma nyid dang thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la rang bzhin dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta yin na thams cad shes pa nyid dang skad cig ma nyid dang thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la rang bzhin dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is ‚Äúnature‚Äù and so on.

original: rang bzhin ni skad cig ma nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni skad cig ma nyid do //
translated: Nature is momentariness.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba sgrub par byed pa la 'bras bu yin zhing /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba sgrub par byed pa la 'bras bu yin zhing /
translated: In the proof of freedom from attachment, it is the result.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ni bden pa ste ma nor bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ni bden pa ste ma nor bar ston pa'o //
translated: In the knowledge of all, it is the truth, which is taught without error.

original: bden pa mthong ba la gzung ba dang cig shos la sogs pa ma mthong ba ni stong pa la'o //
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba la gzung ba dang cig shos la sogs pa ma mthong ba ni stong pa la'o //
translated: In the seeing of the truth, the non-seeing of subject and object, and so on, is in regard to emptiness.

original: 'brel de dngos la zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis bsgrub bya la 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel de dngos la zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis bsgrub bya la 'brel pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat connection to the actual‚Äù is the connection to the nature of the probandum.

original: grub pa yin pa ni mngon sum la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa yin pa ni mngon sum la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEstablished‚Äù is direct perception and so on.

original: rang la ste rgol ba sangs rgyas pa la ci'i phyir ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: rang la ste rgol ba sangs rgyas pa la ci'i phyir ma grub pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFor oneself‚Äù means that the Buddhist opponent does not establish it.

original: gang gis pha rol pos khas blangs pa sgrub byed du 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis pha rol pos khas blangs pa sgrub byed du 'gyur /
translated: By what means would the opponent‚Äôs acceptance become a proof?

original: bden te grangs can gyi yang rmi lam gyi shes pa de lta bu'i rnam pa can nyid sgrub byed yin no zhes zer ba la gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ste rtogs par bya bas so //
analyzed: bden te grangs can gyi yang rmi lam gyi shes pa de lta bu'i rnam pa can nyid sgrub byed yin no zhes zer ba la gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ste rtogs par bya bas so //
translated: True, but the proof of the existence of the dream consciousness of the SƒÅ·πÉkhya is the same.

original: 'grel pa ni gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni gsal ba yin no //
translated: The commentary is clear.

original: gzhan gyis brtags pa yis zhes bya ba ni rim gyis byed pa nyid yin na mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis brtags pa yis zhes bya ba ni rim gyis byed pa nyid yin na mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the imputation of others‚Äù means that if it is produced gradually, it is impermanent.üîΩOtherwise, if it is produced all at once, it would follow that the self and so on are impermanent.

original: gzhan du na cig car ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdag la sogs pa la thal bar 'gyur ba ni @226b chos can ma grub na khyed kyi yang sgrub byed ji ltar yin te /üîΩma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la gnyis 'brel phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan du na cig car ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdag la sogs pa la thal bar 'gyur ba ni @226b chos can ma grub na khyed kyi yang sgrub byed ji ltar yin te / ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la gnyis 'brel phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: If the subject is not established, how can it be a proof for you?üîΩBecause it is uncertain.

original: chos gnyis chos can gzhan la khyab bya khyab byed kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gnyis chos can gzhan la khyab bya khyab byed kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the relation of two‚Äù means that the two properties are the nature of the pervader and the pervaded in relation to another subject.

original: gcig ste khyab byed med na gzhan te khyab bya dgag pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: gcig ste khyab byed med na gzhan te khyab bya dgag pa'i don du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne‚Äù means the pervader. ‚ÄúThe other‚Äù means the pervaded. The meaning is that it is negated.

original: kha cig na re chos can la med pa yin na yang sgrub byed nyid dang cig shos kyang 'gal ba ma yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re chos can la med pa yin na yang sgrub byed nyid dang cig shos kyang 'gal ba ma yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say: Even though the property of the subject does not exist, the proof and the other are not contradictory.

original: shing med na sha pa med pa de bzhin du ni ma yin te rung ba ma yin pa'i ma dmigs pa las ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing med na sha pa med pa de bzhin du ni ma yin te rung ba ma yin pa'i ma dmigs pa las ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not like the absence of a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree when there is no tree, because of the uncertainty from the non-apprehension of what is possible.

original: khyad par la rung ba ma yin zhing spyi la rung ba nyid kyi sa phyogs la ni nges par brjod pa de'i phyir ma bstan pa'i yul la khyab byed med na /
analyzed: khyad par la rung ba ma yin zhing spyi la rung ba nyid kyi sa phyogs la ni nges par brjod pa de'i phyir ma bstan pa'i yul la khyab byed med na /
translated: In the particular, what is possible is not possible, but in the general, it is possible. Therefore, in the unstated domain, if the pervader does not exist,

original: gnod par byed pas khyab pa grub pa la 'di dgos pa yin zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: gnod par byed pas khyab pa grub pa la 'di dgos pa yin zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: the opponent says that this is necessary for establishing the pervasion by the contradictor. This is the position of the Jaina.

original: gnyis ni chos te 'bras bu dang rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: gnyis ni chos te 'bras bu dang rang bzhin yin la /
translated: The two properties are the effect and the nature.

original: 'brel pa ste rab tu 'brel pa chos can gzhan la grub pa'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa ste rab tu 'brel pa chos can gzhan la grub pa'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: The connection, or relation, is not a consequence because it is established in another subject.

original: dper na byed pa po nyid la rim pa dang rim pa ma yin pa dag gis khyab pa bum pa la sogs pa la yin pa bdag la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na byed pa po nyid la rim pa dang rim pa ma yin pa dag gis khyab pa bum pa la sogs pa la yin pa bdag la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, it would follow that the agent itself would pervade the pot, etc., in terms of sequence and non-sequence, and also the self, etc.

original: rim pa ma yin te skad cig re re zhing gzhan nyid yin pas mi rtag pa nyid yin te rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa ma yin te skad cig re re zhing gzhan nyid yin pas mi rtag pa nyid yin te rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not non-sequential, because it is momentary and different in each moment, so it is impermanent, because it contradicts permanence.

original: sgro btags pa yang 'gal ba'i yul yin te /
analyzed: sgro btags pa yang 'gal ba'i yul yin te /
translated: Superimposition is also a contradictory object.

original: yod pa dang med pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like existence and non-existence.

original: cig car nyid yin na yang skad cig gzhan la byed pa po nyid ma yin pas med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sgrub byed ma yin te /
analyzed: cig car nyid yin na yang skad cig gzhan la byed pa po nyid ma yin pas med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sgrub byed ma yin te /
translated: Even if it were simultaneous, since it is not an agent in another moment, it is non-existent, so it is not a proof,

original: ma grub pa'i chos can la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i chos can la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no certainty about a subject that is not established.

original: khyab pa ni ma nges pa'i yul can yin te de dag med na 'ang de med ces brjod pa las kyang de rtogs phyir zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: khyab pa ni ma nges pa'i yul can yin te de dag med na 'ang de med ces brjod pa las kyang de rtogs phyir zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Pervasion has an uncertain object, because even when they are absent, it is said that it is absent, so it is understood.

original: gtan tshigs med na chos can mi 'gyur ba'i phyir rtsa ba las byung ba'i rtsa ba can ni gnod par byed pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs med na chos can mi 'gyur ba'i phyir rtsa ba las byung ba'i rtsa ba can ni gnod par byed pa nyid yin te /
translated: Because if there is no reason, there is no subject. Therefore, the root of the argument is the refutation itself.

original: dpyod pa rtsom pa na byung ba'i phyir de'i khyab pa bzlog nas ston pa ni thal 'gyur mi na no //
analyzed: dpyod pa rtsom pa na byung ba'i phyir de'i khyab pa bzlog nas ston pa ni thal 'gyur mi na no //
translated: Because it arises at the beginning of the analysis, the demonstration of the reversal of the pervasion of that is the reductio.

original: yul dang dus dang gnas skabs kyi khyad par rnam par nges pa gcig dang 'dres pa las rnam par bcad pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gzhan med pa'i phyir zhes bya bas gcig dang du ma'i nyid dag la gcig dang sna tshogs pa la 'jug pa nyid kyis
analyzed: yul dang dus dang gnas skabs kyi khyad par rnam par nges pa gcig dang 'dres pa las rnam par bcad pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gzhan med pa'i phyir zhes bya bas gcig dang du ma'i nyid dag la gcig dang sna tshogs pa la 'jug pa nyid kyis
translated: Because there is no nature that is not an exclusion from a single thing that is mixed with a particular of place, time, and occasion, the pervasion of the one and the many by the single and the various isüîΩexcluded.

original: khyab pa'o // tha mi dad pa yin na gcig kha bsgyur bas thams cad kha bsgyur bar 'gyur @227a * //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gnod par byed pa ston pa yin la /
analyzed: khyab pa'o // tha mi dad pa yin na gcig kha bsgyur bas thams cad kha bsgyur bar 'gyur @227a * // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnod par byed pa ston pa yin la /
translated: If they were not different, then by changing one, all would be changed.üîΩThus, it demonstrates the refutation.

original: de nyid kyis de zlog pa la mthar thug pa bstan par bya bar brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyis de zlog pa la mthar thug pa bstan par bya bar brjod do //
translated: By that alone, the demonstration of the reversal of that is said to be the ultimate.

original: sna tshogs pa la 'jug pa nyid sna tshogs pa nyid kho na la ma yin pa la ma yin nam khyab pa can nyid la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa la 'jug pa nyid sna tshogs pa nyid kho na la ma yin pa la ma yin nam khyab pa can nyid la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Is it not the case that the very engagement with the manifold is in the manifold itself, and that the very pervasion is in the pervaded?

original: de'i phyir du ma nyid la sna tshogs la 'jug pa ni 'gal ba khyab pa yin no zhes zer ba ni gal te gcig yin yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir du ma nyid la sna tshogs la 'jug pa ni 'gal ba khyab pa yin no zhes zer ba ni gal te gcig yin yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the engagement with the manifold in the manifold is a pervasion that is contradictory.

original: dus la khyab pa la mngon sum gnod par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dus la khyab pa la mngon sum gnod par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The direct perception that contradicts the pervasion of time is taught:

original: ma yin te dus du ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin te dus du ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: No, because of the manifoldness of time.

original: de lta min na khyed kyis kyang sngon dang phyi ma ngi ltar rtogs pa zhes zer ba la sngon dang phyi ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta min na khyed kyis kyang sngon dang phyi ma ngi ltar rtogs pa zhes zer ba la sngon dang phyi ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, you would also say, ‚ÄúThe understanding of the prior and the posterior is like that,‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe prior and the posterior.‚Äù

original: dus las mthong ba med pa'i phyir rtog pa med par bstan pa ni de'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus las mthong ba med pa'i phyir rtog pa med par bstan pa ni de'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that there is no conception without seeing time is ‚Äúat that time.‚Äù

original: dus med pa'i phyir ni ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus med pa'i phyir ni ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no time, there is no seeing.

original: tha snyad ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: tha snyad ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Convention is conception.

original: yod kyang ni mthong kyang ngo //
analyzed: yod kyang ni mthong kyang ngo //
translated: Even if it exists, it is seen.

original: dus tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: dus tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the difference in time‚Äù means because of being past, etc.

original: gcig nyid du khas len na tha dad pa dang 'gal ba ma yin par bstan pa ni rtag dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig nyid du khas len na tha dad pa dang 'gal ba ma yin par bstan pa ni rtag dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one accepts that they are the same, the contradiction with difference is shown by ‚Äúeternity, etc.‚Äù

original: lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba ni r'a ma dang / r'a ma na la sogs pa lhan cig spyod pa rnams so //
analyzed: lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba ni r'a ma dang / r'a ma na la sogs pa lhan cig spyod pa rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúCo-existent‚Äù means co-existent with the rƒÅma and rƒÅmanƒÅ, etc.

original: de bzhin phyir ni 'das pa la sogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin phyir ni 'das pa la sogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the same reason‚Äù means because of being past, etc.

original: phan tshun du zhes bya ba ni lhan cig spyod pa rnams rang gis de lta bu nyid yin na dus su rtog pa med do //
analyzed: phan tshun du zhes bya ba ni lhan cig spyod pa rnams rang gis de lta bu nyid yin na dus su rtog pa med do //
translated: ‚ÄúMutually‚Äù means that if the co-existent ones are such by themselves, there is no conception of time.

original: de lta bu nyid ma yin na yang gcig gis gzhan gyi gsal ba de ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la gnyis po lhan cig 'byung na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid ma yin na yang gcig gis gzhan gyi gsal ba de ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la gnyis po lhan cig 'byung na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If they are not such, how can one be the manifestation of the other?

original: dus su rtogs par byed kyang de lta bu'i khyad par gyi ngo bo khas len pa yin no //
analyzed: dus su rtogs par byed kyang de lta bu'i khyad par gyi ngo bo khas len pa yin no //
translated: If the two arise together, then there is the conception of time, but one accepts the nature of such a distinction.

original: gzhan du na rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'das pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'das pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, it would be without a cause. This is what is being taught.

original: dngos po la yod pa'i ngo bo de ci zhig yin zhes zer ba la rgyu yod pa dang zhes bya ba ste sngar ro //
analyzed: dngos po la yod pa'i ngo bo de ci zhig yin zhes zer ba la rgyu yod pa dang zhes bya ba ste sngar ro //
translated: What is the nature of the existent entity? It is said: ‚ÄúWhen there is a cause.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu yod na zhes bya ba ni de lta ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu yod na zhes bya ba ni de lta ba'o //
translated: When there is an effect, it is like that.

original: de med pa las ni med pa la ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de med pa las ni med pa la ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: From the non-existent, the non-existent arises.

original: dus la sogs pa mi dmigs pa bzhin pa ma yin pa yang snga ma la sogs pa nyid dmigs pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dus la sogs pa mi dmigs pa bzhin pa ma yin pa yang snga ma la sogs pa nyid dmigs pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not like the non-apprehension of time, etc. It is only the apprehension of the prior, etc. This is the meaning.

original: byas so zhes bya bas bya ba dang rdzas kyang yin la /
analyzed: byas so zhes bya bas bya ba dang rdzas kyang yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is done‚Äù refers to action and substance.

original: yun ring po zhes bya ba ni de la ma gtogs pa'i dus yin no snyam du sems pa ni 'on te yun ring zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yun ring po zhes bya ba ni de la ma gtogs pa'i dus yin no snyam du sems pa ni 'on te yun ring zhes bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor a long time‚Äù means a time not included in that. This is what is thought. ‚ÄúOr for a long time‚Äù is said.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni khyab pa can gyis so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni khyab pa can gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy another‚Äù means by the pervader.

original: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khyab @227b pa can la'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khyab @227b pa can la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that way‚Äù refers to the pervaded.

original: byas so zhes bya ba ni spyi yin zhing yun ring po zhes bya ba ni de'i khyad par yin te /
analyzed: byas so zhes bya ba ni spyi yin zhing yun ring po zhes bya ba ni de'i khyad par yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is done‚Äù is the general statement, and ‚Äúfor a long time‚Äù is a particular case of that.

original: autpala sngon po lta bu'o zhes bstan pa ni gzung ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: autpala sngon po lta bu'o zhes bstan pa ni gzung ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //

original: tshad ma yis zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa ste de ma yin pa las log pas ni rtog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshad ma yis zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa ste de ma yin pa las log pas ni rtog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúBy means of valid cognition‚Äù means without conceptualization. ‚ÄúBy means of what is not that‚Äù means by means of conceptualization.

original: rgyug pa ni 'gro ba ste de'i gnas skabs kyi shes pa nyid las 'byed bzhin pa dang cig shos dag la gcig tu zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyug pa ni 'gro ba ste de'i gnas skabs kyi shes pa nyid las 'byed bzhin pa dang cig shos dag la gcig tu zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúRunning‚Äù is going. The cognition of that state is the activity of going, because it is the cause of the conception of the goer as one with the nongoer.

original: bag chags cam las byung ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par byed pa'i bya ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags cam las byung ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par byed pa'i bya ba'o //
translated: The activity of going is the cause of the conception of the goer as one with the nongoer.üîΩIf there were no difference, there would be no activity.

original: gal te tha dad med na zhes bya ba phyogs rjes su brjod nas mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skyon brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te tha dad med na zhes bya ba phyogs rjes su brjod nas mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skyon brjod pa'o //
translated: Having stated the position, he says, ‚ÄúThere would be no activity.‚Äù

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang ldan pa ste ldog pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang ldan pa ste ldog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means that there would be no activity of going.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni rjes su ldog pa'o//
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni rjes su ldog pa'o//
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover‚Äù means that there would be no activity of coming.

original: sngar zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa po'i byed pa'i yul zhes bya ba der ro //
analyzed: sngar zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa po'i byed pa'i yul zhes bya ba der ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBefore‚Äù means in the place where the goer is active.

original: rtags la sogs zhes bya ba ni rtags med pa dang grangs med pa la sogs pa ni med par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro ngo bo med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtags la sogs zhes bya ba ni rtags med pa dang grangs med pa la sogs pa ni med par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro ngo bo med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù in the above verse refers to the absence of a mark and the absence of a number, etc. The meaning of the statement is that these are all types of non-existence.

original: de kho na nyid ma yin zhes bya ba ni dngos po las tha dad pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ma yin zhes bya ba ni dngos po las tha dad pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúnot a reality‚Äù means that they are not different from an entity.

original: tshig phrad kyi dbye bas dngos po'i dbye ba ni tshig phrad ji snyed pa'o zhes bstan pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: tshig phrad kyi dbye bas dngos po'i dbye ba ni tshig phrad ji snyed pa'o zhes bstan pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The verse states that the number of entities is equal to the number of different types of words that are used to describe them.

original: bya ba'i khyad par gsal bar byed pa yun ring ba la sogs pa rnams yin te /
analyzed: bya ba'i khyad par gsal bar byed pa yun ring ba la sogs pa rnams yin te /
translated: The words ‚Äúlong,‚Äù etc., are used to describe the particular characteristics of an action.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù is illustrated by the words ‚Äúthus,‚Äù etc.

original: de'i rten zhes bya ba ni khra bo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rten zhes bya ba ni khra bo la sogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúits basis‚Äù refers to a multicolored object, etc.

original: gcig la lus pas tha mi dad pa gzhan la tha mi dad par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni der zhugs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig la lus pas tha mi dad pa gzhan la tha mi dad par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni der zhugs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The verse states that if a multicolored object is not different from its color, then it cannot be different from other objects.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni rten gzhan yang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni rten gzhan yang ngo //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúall of them‚Äù refers to other objects that are the basis of a cognition.

original: de'i rnam pa can gyi blo dang gsal ba yang rig pa'i yul yin gyi gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni blo @228a * //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can gyi blo dang gsal ba yang rig pa'i yul yin gyi gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni blo @228a * //
translated: The statement that the object of awareness is only that which has the aspect of the cognition and the manifestation, and not anything else, is as follows:

original: rnams zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Cognitions.

original: 'di'i don ni gsal ba dang blo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo'i sgra'i don brjod bya gang yin pa de'i ste rnam par dpyad na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni gsal ba dang blo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo'i sgra'i don brjod bya gang yin pa de'i ste rnam par dpyad na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The meaning of this is as follows: The referent of the term ‚Äúmanifestation‚Äù or ‚Äúcognition‚Äù is that which has such a nature.

original: rnam pa gnyis su ni gnyis nyid du'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su ni gnyis nyid du'o //
translated: In two ways means in two ways.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni blo'i'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni blo'i'o //
translated: Its own nature is that of the cognition.

original: de'i tshe ni de'i blo'i dus na'o //üîΩsnang ba nyid ces bya ba ni rtog pa med pa'i rtogs pas gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni de'i blo'i dus na'o // snang ba nyid ces bya ba ni rtog pa med pa'i rtogs pas gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang 'dzin pa'o //
translated: At that time means at the time of the cognition.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù means that the cognition apprehends the object that has the aspect of the object, and the manifestation that has the aspect of the cognition.

original: gang gi phyir sngon po ni sngon po ma yin pa las bzhin du sngon po gzhan las kyang ldog par rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngon po ni sngon po ma yin pa las bzhin du sngon po gzhan las kyang ldog par rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since blue is understood to be distinguished from non-blue, it is distinguished from other things that are blue.

original: sngon po yang de'i gzhan ba las sngon po ma yin pa las bzhin du de ma yin pa las log pa las byung ba'i rnam par rtag pa ma gtogs par tha dad pa nyid du ma mthong bar bstan pa ni rang lta'i phyogs su zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po yang de'i gzhan ba las sngon po ma yin pa las bzhin du de ma yin pa las log pa las byung ba'i rnam par rtag pa ma gtogs par tha dad pa nyid du ma mthong bar bstan pa ni rang lta'i phyogs su zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is shown by the words ‚Äúin the domain of one‚Äôs own cognition.‚Äù

original: blo 'di ni blo med kyi zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: blo 'di ni blo med kyi zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúcognition‚Äù should be supplied.

original: de dang tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni lkog shal la sogs pa las tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de dang tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni lkog shal la sogs pa las tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The characteristic of non-difference from that is the nature of non-difference from the dewlap, etc.

original: de ltar mngon sum gyis gzung ba med phyir ni du ma nyid du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar mngon sum gyis gzung ba med phyir ni du ma nyid du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the grasped by direct perception, because of the grasping of multiplicity.

original: gsal ba thams cad rnam pa gcig yin no snyam du sems pa la gcig phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba thams cad rnam pa gcig yin no snyam du sems pa la gcig phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The idea that all cognitions are of one form is refuted by the words ‚Äúbecause of the one.‚Äù

original: gsal ba thams cad la rnam pa gcig tu shes pa na gsal ba thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsal ba thams cad la rnam pa gcig tu shes pa na gsal ba thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur te /
translated: When all cognitions are known to be of one form, all cognitions are grasped.

original: de'i rnam pa dang ldan pa dang gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro; ;
analyzed: de'i rnam pa dang ldan pa dang gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro; ;
translated: Because the forms of those and the cognitions are not different.

original: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni gsal ba gzhan la gnas pa'i spyi'i ngo bo /üîΩde yi bdag nyid kho na las //
analyzed: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni gsal ba gzhan la gnas pa'i spyi'i ngo bo / de yi bdag nyid kho na las //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù means another manifestation.

original: zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha mi dad pa las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha mi dad pa las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that very nature‚Äù means from the nature of the apprehended aspect.

original: de bdag nyid ni snga ma'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de bdag nyid ni snga ma'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very nature‚Äù means the nature of the previous aspect.

original: de'i bdag nyid can ni lkog shal la sogs pa'i yang yin gyi de'i bdag nyid ma yin pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can ni lkog shal la sogs pa'i yang yin gyi de'i bdag nyid ma yin pas ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving that nature‚Äù means having the nature of the cow‚Äôs hump, etc., but not having the nature of that.

original: de de'i bdag nyid nyid yin pa ni gzhan gyi yang gzhan du yin gyi de yang de ltar mi 'gyur bar zhes bya ba'i rigs pa'o //
analyzed: de de'i bdag nyid nyid yin pa ni gzhan gyi yang gzhan du yin gyi de yang de ltar mi 'gyur bar zhes bya ba'i rigs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very nature‚Äù means the nature of another, but not the nature of that. This is the reasoning.

original: brgyud pa zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni de bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brgyud pa zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni de bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúseries‚Äù is ‚Äúthat very nature.‚Äù

original: de dang tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: de dang tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNon-different from that‚Äù means non-different from the aspect.

original: de las gzhan ni rnam pa gzhan te gsal ba gzhan la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan ni rnam pa gzhan te gsal ba gzhan la gnas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOther than that‚Äù means another aspect, another manifestation.

original: de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ni sngar gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha mi dad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ni sngar gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha mi dad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is not different from that, it is not different from the apprehended aspect.

original: mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rnam pa gzhan nyid ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rnam pa gzhan nyid ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: It does not change means it is not another aspect.

original: rnam par bshad pa byed pa ni sbyor ba smra ba po mu stegs sha ba ra'o //
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa byed pa ni sbyor ba smra ba po mu stegs sha ba ra'o //
translated: The commentator is the Mƒ´mƒÅ·πÉsaka tƒ´rthika ≈öabarasvƒÅmin.

original: gcig la zhig pas ni zhes bya ba ni spangs pa yin par @228b lan btab pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig la zhig pas ni zhes bya ba ni spangs pa yin par @228b lan btab pa yin no //
translated: He replies, ‚ÄúIf it is the same, it is destroyed,‚Äù meaning it is abandoned.

original: rnam pa dang ldan pa'i yon tan la sogs pa las rnam pa tha dad pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa dang ldan pa'i yon tan la sogs pa las rnam pa tha dad pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIf it is not different from the aspect, it is not different from the qualities, etc. that possess the aspect.‚Äù

original: dbye ba byed pa'i tha dad pa ni rnam pa'i yang yin par bstan pa ni rnam pa la yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbye ba byed pa'i tha dad pa ni rnam pa'i yang yin par bstan pa ni rnam pa la yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: He teaches that the difference that creates distinctions is also an aspect, saying, ‚ÄúIt is also in the aspect.‚Äù

original: tha mi dad pa yin na rnam pa dang ldan pa'i ngo bo nyid tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yin na rnam pa dang ldan pa'i ngo bo nyid tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it is not different, the nature that possesses the aspect is different.

original: tha dad pa ma yin pa'i yon tan yang de dang ldan pa'i dbye ba byed pa kho na ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni tha dad min phyogs zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin pa'i yon tan yang de dang ldan pa'i dbye ba byed pa kho na ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni tha dad min phyogs zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Is it not the case that the quality of non-difference is also a distinction that belongs to it?

original: yon tan dang yon tan can dag go //
analyzed: yon tan dang yon tan can dag go //
translated: The quality and the possessor of the quality.

original: tha dad ni khyad par can gyi spyi'o //
analyzed: tha dad ni khyad par can gyi spyi'o //
translated: Difference is the universal of the particular.

original: gzhan du ni khyad par med na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni khyad par med na'o //
translated: Otherwise, if there were no difference,

original: tha dad med ces bya ba ni gsal ba dang rnam pa'i'o //
analyzed: tha dad med ces bya ba ni gsal ba dang rnam pa'i'o //
translated: Non-difference is that of the manifestation and the form.

original: tha dad pa las zhes bya ba ni nag po la sogs pa las so //
analyzed: tha dad pa las zhes bya ba ni nag po la sogs pa las so //
translated: From difference, from black, etc.

original: de bshad pa ni rnam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni rnam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is explained as possessing the form.

original: yon tan rnams zhes bya ba ni rten pa rnams so //
analyzed: yon tan rnams zhes bya ba ni rten pa rnams so //
translated: The qualities are the dependent ones.

original: rigs pas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi snang ba sgrub pa ni rtogs pas gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni thams cad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs pas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi snang ba sgrub pa ni rtogs pas gnod pa yin par bstan pa ni thams cad ces bya ba'o //
translated: The establishment of the appearance of the nature of everything by reasoning is shown to be undermined by understanding: everything.

original: gnod pa la rigs pa bstan pa ni rgyu las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnod pa la rigs pa bstan pa ni rgyu las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reasoning for the undermining is shown: from the cause.

original: skyes par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i skyes pa ni byung ba'o //
analyzed: skyes par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i skyes pa ni byung ba'o //
translated: The arising that is called arising is occurrence.

original: gal te zhes bya ni khas blangs pa yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ni khas blangs pa yin na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù indicates an acceptance.

original: 'di thob par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di thob par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very‚Äù indicates the teaching of the attainment of that.

original: gsal ba ni mngon par gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba ni mngon par gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúManifest‚Äù means clearly manifest.

original: yang gsal ba ni khyad par yin te khra bo la sogs pa lta bu yin gyi gsog ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yang gsal ba ni khyad par yin te khra bo la sogs pa lta bu yin gyi gsog ni ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúAgain manifest‚Äù is a particular, like a multicolored object, and not a mass,

original: thams cad stong par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'dir ni 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad stong par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'dir ni 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because everything would be empty. This is indicated by ‚Äúhere.‚Äù

original: rgyu la ni gtso bo la'o //
analyzed: rgyu la ni gtso bo la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the cause‚Äù means in the principal cause.

original: yod phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nus pa'i ngo bor ro //
analyzed: yod phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nus pa'i ngo bor ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of existence‚Äù means in the nature of the capacity.

original: gzhan nyid ces bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan nyid ces bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDifference‚Äù means manifestation.

original: sngar lha gsol bar mthong ba'i rang gang gi yin pa de'i'o //
analyzed: sngar lha gsol bar mthong ba'i rang gang gi yin pa de'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the one who previously saw the god.

original: de ni tha snyad la zhes bya ba ni snga nas 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: de ni tha snyad la zhes bya ba ni snga nas 'dug pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn convention‚Äù means previously existing.

original: sngon po ni sngon po ma yin du sngon gzhan kyang tha mi dad par dmigs pa kho na yin par bshad pa ni de bzhin du dus mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po ni sngon po ma yin du sngon gzhan kyang tha mi dad par dmigs pa kho na yin par bshad pa ni de bzhin du dus mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBlue‚Äù is not non-blue, and it is only observed as different from other things. This is explained by ‚Äújust as, at the same time.‚Äù

original: mngon sum med pa'i phyir gzhal bya med pa yin yang shes pa mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni rtogs pa 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum med pa'i phyir gzhal bya med pa yin yang shes pa mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni rtogs pa 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Although the object of comprehension does not exist because of the non-existence of direct perception, the consciousness is the same. This is indicated by the words ‚Äúthis realization.‚Äù

original: rnam pa mtshungs pa nyid ces bya ba ni tha dad par zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam pa mtshungs pa nyid ces bya ba ni tha dad par zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The words ‚Äúthe same aspect‚Äù are connected with the words ‚Äúdifferent.‚Äù

original: de ni rtogs pa cam zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can nyid kyi shes pa ste /
analyzed: de ni rtogs pa cam zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can nyid kyi shes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThat is merely the realization‚Äù is the consciousness that has the same aspect.

original: gzhi mthun pa'i phyir de'i rtags nyid do //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa'i phyir de'i rtags nyid do //
translated: Because of the common basis, it is the very sign of that.

original: zhen par bya ba'i rnam pa de zhen pa las phyir rol nyid ma yin @229a * //
analyzed: zhen par bya ba'i rnam pa de zhen pa las phyir rol nyid ma yin @229a * //
translated: The aspect of the object of apprehension is not external to the apprehension.

original: nam zhes zer ba la rtogs par bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o //üîΩde 'dra'i dngos min rig min phyir snang bzhin pa ma yin pa'i gzung ba nyid la dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis khyab pa ni snga ma phyi ma'i khyad par dang spyi'i shes pa mthong bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nam zhes zer ba la rtogs par bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o // de 'dra'i dngos min rig min phyir snang bzhin pa ma yin pa'i gzung ba nyid la dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis khyab pa ni snga ma phyi ma'i khyad par dang spyi'i shes pa mthong bar bstan pa ni /
translated: When it is said ‚Äúhow?‚Äù it is the object of realization.

original: mtshungs pa'i rnam pa'i rtogs pa gang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i rnam pa'i rtogs pa gang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is not a thing like that, it is not cognized. Because of the non-existence of the apprehended that appears, it is pervaded by the non-existence of the objective support. The indication of the perception of the particular and general consciousness is ‚Äúthat realization with the same aspect.‚Äù

original: sngon dang phyi ma'i khyad par dag mtshungs pa'i rnam pa'i shes pa gang gi yin pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: sngon dang phyi ma'i khyad par dag mtshungs pa'i rnam pa'i shes pa gang gi yin pa de bzhin no //
translated: The cognition of the difference between the prior and subsequent is just like that.

original: de zhes bya ba ni ba long ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni ba long ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word that refers to the blind man.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni rta ngang pa dang ba khra bo la sogs ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni rta ngang pa dang ba khra bo la sogs ba'o //
translated: The word all refers to the horse, the swan, the cow, the variegated [cow], and so on.

original: ji ltar skye zhes bya ba la kha cig nyid du zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ji ltar skye zhes bya ba la kha cig nyid du zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: How is it produced? In the same way refers to the remainder.

original: spyi med pa ni mtshungs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi med pa ni mtshungs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the absence of universals is not similar.

original: khyab par bya ba 'am khyab par byed pa med na ni ma grub pa'i chos can la ma nges pa'i phyir sgrub byed ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni gal te spyi gsal ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: khyab par bya ba 'am khyab par byed pa med na ni ma grub pa'i chos can la ma nges pa'i phyir sgrub byed ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni gal te spyi gsal ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If there is no pervaded or pervader, is it not the case that the probandum is not established, and so it is not a proof? If a universal inheres in an individual, and so on.

original: rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not a different nature.

original: 'di ni thal ba zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni thal ba zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: This is called the reductio because the probandum is obtained.

original: gzhan gyi don rjes su dpag pa la nges pa brjod pa'i phyir ci zhig nges par byas zhes zer ba la gnyi ga 'brel pa'i phyir gcig yod na gzhan 'thob pa yin la gzhan med par khas len na de yang med do zhes bya bas thob par 'gyur
analyzed: gzhan gyi don rjes su dpag pa la nges pa brjod pa'i phyir ci zhig nges par byas zhes zer ba la gnyi ga 'brel pa'i phyir gcig yod na gzhan 'thob pa yin la gzhan med par khas len na de yang med do zhes bya bas thob par 'gyur
translated: In order to ascertain the inference for the sake of others, he says, ‚ÄúWhat is ascertained?‚Äù In response, since both are related, when one exists, the other is obtained. If the other is accepted as nonexistent, then that is also nonexistent.

original: ro // min na zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: ro // min na zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Not so‚Äù means ‚Äúnot understood.‚Äù

original: ldog pa 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa la rjes su dpag pa 'brel pa'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir lung gi don rnams la phan tshun 'gal bar sems pa bzhin no zhes bstan pa ni 'di ni thal ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ldog pa 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa la rjes su dpag pa 'brel pa'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir lung gi don rnams la phan tshun 'gal bar sems pa bzhin no zhes bstan pa ni 'di ni thal ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Since the reverse is the effect, it is uncertain. Since the inference is related to the root, it is like the mutually contradictory thoughts about the meaning of scripture. This is taught by ‚ÄúThis is called reductio.‚Äù

original: thob par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thob par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the nature of being obtained.

original: sgrub byed pa ni ldog pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir dang 'brel pa'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub byed pa ni ldog pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir dang 'brel pa'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the proof has the effect of the reverse, and because it is related to the root.

original: gcig la mthar thug pa ma yin na du ma la mthar thug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig la mthar thug pa ma yin na du ma la mthar thug pa ma yin te /
translated: If there is no final end to one, there is no final end to many.

original: mngon sum dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de ni thun mong nyid yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de ni thun mong nyid yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response that it contradicts direct perception is stated in the line, ‚ÄúIf it is commonality itself. . . .‚Äù

original: de'i ngo bo ni khyab pa can gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni khyab pa can gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: Its nature is the nature of the pervader.

original: sun dbyung ba 'di lta bu yang yod par bstan pa ni phan tshun zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sun dbyung ba 'di lta bu yang yod par bstan pa ni phan tshun zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response that there is also this kind of refutation is stated in the line, ‚ÄúIf it is the other . . . .‚ÄùüîΩSince it is not tenable in any other way, it is the cognition of a similar aspect. The meaning is that it is beyond the senses.üîΩThe response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚Äù

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pas zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i rnam pa'i shes pa'i ste dbang po las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pas zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i rnam pa'i shes pa'i ste dbang po las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚Äù

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid can lung can ma yin pa nyid kyis so zhes zer ba ni gzhan gyi chos ni zhes bya ba'o //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir ni khyad par nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid can lung can ma yin pa nyid kyis so zhes zer ba ni gzhan gyi chos ni zhes bya ba'o // de nyid kyi phyir ni khyad par nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚Äù

original: khyab pa can nyid mi 'dzin na de lta bu'i ngo bo'i spyi ma yin @229b par bstan pa ni khyab pa nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyab pa can nyid mi 'dzin na de lta bu'i ngo bo'i spyi ma yin @229b par bstan pa ni khyab pa nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response that it is not tenable because it is not a property of the other is stated in the line, ‚ÄúThe other‚Äôs property . . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe response that it is not tenable because

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi khyad par dang ldan pa spyi ma yin par bstan pa ni rang ngo bos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi khyad par dang ldan pa spyi ma yin par bstan pa ni rang ngo bos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is not a universal that possesses the distinction of its own nature is ‚Äúby its own nature.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir ni rang gi gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir ni rang gi gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù is because of its own apprehension.

original: mtshungs na ni zhes bya ba'i rgol ba la lan gzhan gyi sgo nas yang bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshungs na ni zhes bya ba'i rgol ba la lan gzhan gyi sgo nas yang bstan pa yin te /
translated: The response to the objection, ‚ÄúIf it is the same . . . ,‚Äù is taught again by another door:

original: spyi khas len pa la tshad mar brgal zhing brtags pa ni thal ba'i ched du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyi khas len pa la tshad mar brgal zhing brtags pa ni thal ba'i ched du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The refutation and investigation of the acceptance of a universal is for the purpose of the reductio.

original: rtsa ba can ni tshul gsum grub pa 'di'i'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba can ni tshul gsum grub pa 'di'i'o //
translated: The root is the establishment of the three modes.

original: de la sogs pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: de la sogs pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: Inference is that and so forth.

original: des gzung ba'i 'brel pa ni phyir khyab pa can nyid du khas len pa rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa 'gal bar bstan pa ni yul dang dus zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des gzung ba'i 'brel pa ni phyir khyab pa can nyid du khas len pa rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa 'gal bar bstan pa ni yul dang dus zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The relation of its apprehension is the pervasion of the external. The teaching of the contradiction of the nondifference of the nature of the other is ‚Äúin terms of place and time.‚Äù

original: snang du rung ba'i spyi la khyab pa can nyid ni mngon sum gyis gsal ba yin par bstan pa ni mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang du rung ba'i spyi la khyab pa can nyid ni mngon sum gyis gsal ba yin par bstan pa ni mngon sum gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The clarity by direct perception of the pervasion of the universal that is suitable to appear is taught by ‚Äúby direct perception.‚Äù

original: snang du rung ba thams cad khyab pa can ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa ni ma yin te rnam pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang du rung ba thams cad khyab pa can ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa ni ma yin te rnam pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not taught that everything that is suitable to appear is not pervasive, but rather that the aspect is.

original: 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa nyid kyi sgrub byed yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa nyid kyi sgrub byed yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: How then? It is the proof of reality.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Others say

original: gang gis gsal ba rnam par ni //
analyzed: gang gis gsal ba rnam par ni //
translated: that the aspect is the shape of the object,

original: byed pas rig nyid rnam yin zer //
analyzed: byed pas rig nyid rnam yin zer //
translated: because it is the cause of the cognition of the object.

original: rnam pa ni dbyibs te snang du rung ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa ni dbyibs te snang du rung ba'o //
translated: The aspect is the shape, which is suitable to appear.

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba can gyi phyogs kyis rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba can gyi phyogs kyis rtogs pa'o //
translated: Or, the root position is understood.

original: bzlog pa ni zhes bya ba gcig la mthar thug par dmigs pa'i phyir khyab pa can med do zhes bya ba la 'gal ba brjod pa ni thal 'gyur dang bzlog pa yang yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pa ni zhes bya ba gcig la mthar thug par dmigs pa'i phyir khyab pa can med do zhes bya ba la 'gal ba brjod pa ni thal 'gyur dang bzlog pa yang yin no //
translated: The reversal is that there is no pervasion because of the observation of an end in one. The expression of contradiction is the reductio and the reversal.

original: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa byed pa po dag go //
analyzed: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa byed pa po dag go //
translated: Others are the commentators.

original: bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyi khyab byed med pa'o //
analyzed: bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyi khyab byed med pa'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the pervader, the variety is absent.

original: spyi chos can du ma grub kyang bzlog pa ni de'i chos nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni med par dgag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi chos can du ma grub kyang bzlog pa ni de'i chos nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni med par dgag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Although the universal is not established as the subject, the reverse is taught to be not its property, which is called an external negation.

original: khyab par bya ba med par ni shing sha pa med pa bzhin du nges pa'i yul la bsgrub par bya ba yin te gzhan du na nges par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gal te spyi ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba med par ni shing sha pa med pa bzhin du nges pa'i yul la bsgrub par bya ba yin te gzhan du na nges par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gal te spyi ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The probandum is the object of ascertainment, as in the absence of a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree, because otherwise it would be the ascertainer. This is taught in ‚ÄúIf the universal . . .‚Äù

original: bsgrub bya sgrub pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: Ascertainment is the establishment of the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ni dngos po 'am dngos po ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ni dngos po 'am dngos po ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúReason‚Äù refers to an entity or non-entity.

original: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni rgyal dpog pa'i'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni rgyal dpog pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOther‚Äù refers to the Vai≈õe·π£ika.

original: 'dod pa nyid du zhes bya ba ni grub pa la sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa nyid du zhes bya ba ni grub pa la sgrub pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as desired‚Äù means establishing what is already established.

original: gzhan gyis khas blangs pa ni bde bar gshegs pa pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis khas blangs pa ni bde bar gshegs pa pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAccepted by others‚Äù refers to the followers of the Sugata.

original: des kyang zhes bya ba ni rgyal dpog pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: des kyang zhes bya ba ni rgyal dpog pas kyang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù refers to the Vai≈õe·π£ika.

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i ni khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba ni gzhan sel ba zhes bya @230a * //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i ni khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba ni gzhan sel ba zhes bya @230a * //
translated: The Sugata's is a contradiction of his own assertion.

original: ba'o chos can med na khyab par byed pa tsam dran pa'i yul can ni khyab par bya ba med pa tsam gyi rtogs byed yin pas khyab pa grub pa yin na gzhan du rtsa ba can yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ba'o chos can med na khyab par byed pa tsam dran pa'i yul can ni khyab par bya ba med pa tsam gyi rtogs byed yin pas khyab pa grub pa yin na gzhan du rtsa ba can yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: When the subject is absent, the mere memory of the pervader is the cause of understanding the mere absence of the pervaded, so the pervasion is established. If it were otherwise, the root would be shown to be if there is a relation.

original: 'brel pa yod na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa yod na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For, if there is a relation.

original: gang gi phyir med pa shes tsam las sgrub byed ma yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir med pa shes tsam las sgrub byed ma yin la /
translated: Because the mere knowledge of non-existence is not the proof,

original: yod pa yang de las grub pa ma yin pa de'i phyir don smos pa ni sgrub byed ma yin pa bzlog pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: yod pa yang de las grub pa ma yin pa de'i phyir don smos pa ni sgrub byed ma yin pa bzlog pa'i don du'o //
translated: and existence is not established from that, therefore the mention of the object is for the purpose of excluding the non-proof.

original: 'das pa mchog tu 'dzin pa 'bras bu byed pa ni shin tu 'brel ba can ma yin te med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das pa mchog tu 'dzin pa 'bras bu byed pa ni shin tu 'brel ba can ma yin te med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The extreme of non-existence is not the effect of the supreme, because it is not related.

original: sgrub byed ma yin pa dag bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgrub byed ma yin pa dag bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the non-proofs is

original: sgra dag dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra dag dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the words from sounds, etc.

original: don smos pa tsam yin na don du mngon par 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir lung gis rtogs par bya ba yang don nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don smos pa tsam yin na don du mngon par 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir lung gis rtogs par bya ba yang don nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were merely the meaning that is mentioned, then the meaning would be what is desired, and what is to be understood from the scriptures would be the meaning itself.

original: rtags nyid min pa ni med pa nyid kyis nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags nyid min pa ni med pa nyid kyis nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What is not a reason is not capable, because it does not exist.

original: don ni nus pa can yin te yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni don las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don ni nus pa can yin te yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni don las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning is capable, because it exists. This is shown by the words ‚Äúfrom the meaning.‚Äù

original: nus pa can yang med pa las ma yin par bstan pa ni don ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nus pa can yang med pa las ma yin par bstan pa ni don ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And the capable is not from the non-existent. This is shown by the words ‚Äúthe meaning.‚Äù

original: sgra las grub ba yang don nyid ma yin pa ni don smos pa las yin pa'i phyir sgra smos pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra las grub ba yang don nyid ma yin pa ni don smos pa las yin pa'i phyir sgra smos pa yin no //
translated: What is established from the word is not the meaning itself, because it is from the mention of the meaning. Therefore, the word is mentioned.

original: gnyi ga la gnyi ga ma yin pas grub pa don ma yin pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga la gnyi ga ma yin pas grub pa don ma yin pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What is established by both is not the meaning, because it is excluded by the negation of the meaning.

original: yang na rang mthong ba'i tshig dag gis gnyi ga ma yin pa rtogs pa tsam las grub pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: yang na rang mthong ba'i tshig dag gis gnyi ga ma yin pa rtogs pa tsam las grub pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: Or, by the words ‚Äúseen by oneself,‚Äù the establishment from both is excluded, because it is mere understanding from both.

original: ci las she na don nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ci las she na don nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: From what? From the meaning itself.

original: rang gis mthong ba don med pa ci'i phyir rtags ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: rang gis mthong ba don med pa ci'i phyir rtags ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is what one sees not a reason?

original: nus pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i don las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nus pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i don las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is not capable.üîΩIf the object of understanding exists, the object of understanding is taught.

original: rtogs byed kyi don yod na rtogs bya'i don yin par bstan pa ni don ni grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste rgyal ba can gyi'o//
analyzed: rtogs byed kyi don yod na rtogs bya'i don yin par bstan pa ni don ni grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste rgyal ba can gyi'o//
translated: The meaning of the passage is that the object of understanding is established.

original: de las ni don smos pa las don dang bcas pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: de las ni don smos pa las don dang bcas pa yin pa'o //
translated: From that, the object is mentioned, and it has an object.

original: nges pa'i tshul gsum pa rtags nyid du brjod pa'i phyir de'i ngo bor nges pa med pa ni ma nges pa yin pas bsal ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni don dam par ni zhes bya ba ste 'dir thal 'gyur yin no //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshul gsum pa rtags nyid du brjod pa'i phyir de'i ngo bor nges pa med pa ni ma nges pa yin pas bsal ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni don dam par ni zhes bya ba ste 'dir thal 'gyur yin no //
translated: The third mode is expressed as the reason itself. The absence of ascertainment of its nature is not ascertained. The teaching of the exclusion is ultimately. Here it is a reductio.

original: sgra dang rnam par rtog pa yang de'i rnam pa can yod pa'i phyir nus pa nyid ma yin nam zhes zer ba la rtog dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra dang rnam par rtog pa yang de'i rnam pa can yod pa'i phyir nus pa nyid ma yin nam zhes zer ba la rtog dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Sound and conception also have the form of that, so aren't they capable? Conception is said in response to that.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang sgra yang rtogs par bya ba'i don la 'grel pa can ma yin te 'dod pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang sgra yang rtogs par bya ba'i don la 'grel pa can ma yin te 'dod pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And the word and the concept are not the meaning of the object to be understood, because they are produced from desire.

original: de nyid kyi phyir des sgro btags pa'i de'i yul nyid kyang rang bzhin ma yin pa yin te ma nges pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir des sgro btags pa'i de'i yul nyid kyang rang bzhin ma yin pa yin te ma nges pa'i phyir ro//
translated: Therefore, the object of that which is superimposed by that is not real, because it is indefinite.

original: @230b bsgrub bya mthong ba las byung ba ni de nyid kyi phyir nges pa yin no //
analyzed: @230b bsgrub bya mthong ba las byung ba ni de nyid kyi phyir nges pa yin no //
translated: That which is produced from the perception of the probandum is definite, because of that.

original: sgrub byed las byung ba yang sgrub byed nye bar 'jog par byed pa ni de nyid kyi nus pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub byed las byung ba yang sgrub byed nye bar 'jog par byed pa ni de nyid kyi nus pa'o //
translated: And that which is produced from the proof is the capacity of that which is established by the proof.

original: bsgrub bya las byung ba'am de'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po ni de lta ma yin par bstan pa ni dngos las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya las byung ba'am de'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po ni de lta ma yin par bstan pa ni dngos las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The thing that is produced from the probandum or that has the nature of that is not so, as is taught in the line ‚Äúfrom the thing.‚Äù

original: brtags pa zhes bya ba ni sgra dang rnam rtog gis byas pa rnams 'dod pa longs pa med pa'i phyir ma nges pa rnams so //
analyzed: brtags pa zhes bya ba ni sgra dang rnam rtog gis byas pa rnams 'dod pa longs pa med pa'i phyir ma nges pa rnams so //
translated: The line ‚Äúthe imagined‚Äù means that those which are produced by words and concepts are indefinite because they are produced from desire.

original: bag chags ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags so //
analyzed: bag chags ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags so //
translated: The habitual tendency is the habitual tendency of conceptualization.

original: 'di nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni don 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni don 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This very thing is because of the apprehension of the meaning.

original: dngos su zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi'o //
analyzed: dngos su zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi'o //
translated: Directly is the master's.

original: dngos po ni bsgrub bya ste de 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po ni bsgrub bya ste de 'grub pa'o //
translated: The thing is the probandum, its establishment.

original: bsgrub bya nyid sgrub byed la 'os pa nyid yin pa'i phyir thams cad ni ma yin pas nges pa can gyi don las ldog pa kho na yin pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid sgrub byed la 'os pa nyid yin pa'i phyir thams cad ni ma yin pas nges pa can gyi don las ldog pa kho na yin pa'o //
translated: Since the probandum itself is fit to be the probans, it is not everything, but only that which has a definite meaning.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni 'dir shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can nyid sgrub par byed par 'os pa yin gyi yod pa'i chos nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni 'dir shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can nyid sgrub par byed par 'os pa yin gyi yod pa'i chos nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: The inferable here is the very subject that has the particularity desired to be known, which is fit to be established, not the mere existent property.

original: log par rtogs pa'i phyir de yang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: log par rtogs pa'i phyir de yang yin no zhe na /
translated: That is also because of wrong understanding.

original: de lta na de 'dod bzhin pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya yin par bstan pa ni phyogs dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na de 'dod bzhin pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya yin par bstan pa ni phyogs dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the teaching that it is the probandum by mere desire for it is the paksa, etc.

original: spyi tsam ni nges pa can ma yin zhing khyad par ni byas pa nyid yin par rnam par phye nas bstan pa ni gal te don 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi tsam ni nges pa can ma yin zhing khyad par ni byas pa nyid yin par rnam par phye nas bstan pa ni gal te don 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The general is not certain, but the particular is made, having distinguished and taught. If this is the meaning, then it is the general.

original: 'on te phyogs su byas pa zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: 'on te phyogs su byas pa zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: If it is made into a position, then it is the general.

original: gal te dngos po la zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gal te dngos po la zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: If it is in the thing, then it is free from desire.

original: sgrub par byed pa ni don dam pa'i rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni don dam pa'i rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: The proof is the ultimate inference.

original: de ni phyogs so //
analyzed: de ni phyogs so //
translated: That is the position.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: tshig ni zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig ni zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the words are connected with desire.

original: tshig tsam 'dod pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir don sgrub par byed pa ma yin du zin kyang phyogs kyi tshig 'gal ba nyid du dogs pa bsal bas bsgrub bya nyid sgrub par nges pas sgrub par byed pa'i tshig kyang de nye bar 'jog par byed pa'i phyir 'gyur
analyzed: tshig tsam 'dod pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir don sgrub par byed pa ma yin du zin kyang phyogs kyi tshig 'gal ba nyid du dogs pa bsal bas bsgrub bya nyid sgrub par nges pas sgrub par byed pa'i tshig kyang de nye bar 'jog par byed pa'i phyir 'gyur
translated: Even though the mere words are connected with desire, the words of the position are not contradictory. By removing doubt, the probandum is established. By ascertaining the proof, the words of the proof are also placed.üîΩIs it not so? The meaning is

original: ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la don gyi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba la don gyi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The meaning of is it not? is is it not so?üîΩ

original: don la nges pa las so //
analyzed: don la nges pa las so //
translated: It is from the ascertainment of the meaning.

original: sgra ni de la ma nges pa yin la 'dod pa la nges pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra ni de la ma nges pa yin la 'dod pa la nges pa'i phyir /
translated: The word is not ascertained in that, but is ascertained in the desire.

original: nye bar stobs par mi byed na de dang 'gal ba sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar stobs par mi byed na de dang 'gal ba sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: If it does not assist, then it does not eliminate the contradictory,

original: gtan tshigs don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason is pointless.

original: smra ba po bsal ba yang 'dod pa'i dngos po'i rnam pa can gyi 'dod pa la nges pa las bzlog pa sel ba'i phyir bsgrub bya'i tshig 'ba' zhig rgyur nges pa'o //
analyzed: smra ba po bsal ba yang 'dod pa'i dngos po'i rnam pa can gyi 'dod pa la nges pa las bzlog pa sel ba'i phyir bsgrub bya'i tshig 'ba' zhig rgyur nges pa'o //
translated: Also, the elimination of the speaker is ascertained as the cause of the mere words of the probandum, because the desire is eliminated, which has the aspect of the desired thing.

original: bstan pa'i khyab @231a * //
analyzed: bstan pa'i khyab @231a * //
translated: In the pervasion of the thesis,

original: can la ni de med kyang rgyu'i tshig las ma grub pa las bzlog pa'i rnam pa can rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: can la ni de med kyang rgyu'i tshig las ma grub pa las bzlog pa'i rnam pa can rtogs pa yin la /
translated: even though that is not present, the understanding has the aspect of the opposite of the nonestablished cause from the words.

original: des ni 'gal ba nyid la sogs pa dogs pa bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: des ni 'gal ba nyid la sogs pa dogs pa bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: That teaches the elimination of doubts such as contradiction.

original: phyogs kyi tshig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyogs kyi tshig ces bya ba ste /
translated: The words ‚Äúof the thesis‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: ‚Äúthat‚Äù means ‚Äúfor that reason,‚Äù

original: rang nyid kyis don sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis don sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not itself the establishment of the meaning.
