analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba zhes bya ba'o //üîΩbsgrub bya nyid kho nar brjod pa yin na /
translated: The word ‚Äúprobandum‚Äù is used to eliminate error.üîΩThe

original: de la the tshom za ba dang de dang 'gal ba la yang yin pa'i phyir de la the tshom ldog pa ma yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar phyogs kyi tshig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la the tshom za ba dang de dang 'gal ba la yang yin pa'i phyir de la the tshom ldog pa ma yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar phyogs kyi tshig ces bya ba'o //
translated: Since there is doubt about that and also about what is contrary to it, it is shown that doubt is not eliminated with regard to it.

original: nyams pa nyid ni phyir rgol ba la gzhan gyi don nyid med pa dang rgol ba la rjes su dpag pa nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: nyams pa nyid ni phyir rgol ba la gzhan gyi don nyid med pa dang rgol ba la rjes su dpag pa nyid med pa'o //
translated: The fault is that the other person has no purpose and the proponent has no inference.

original: gang la rjes su dpag pa yin pa de la gzhan gyi don nyid med la gang la gzhan gyi don yin pa de la rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes zer ba ni bstan par bya ba la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang la rjes su dpag pa yin pa de la gzhan gyi don nyid med la gang la gzhan gyi don yin pa de la rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes zer ba ni bstan par bya ba la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: One says that where there is an inference there is no purpose for the other person, and where there is a purpose for the other person there is no inference.

original: tshig ni ma yin te don rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rjod par byed pa nyid 'dod pa la rag @231b las pa'i phyir ro don ni bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: tshig ni ma yin te don rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rjod par byed pa nyid 'dod pa la rag @231b las pa'i phyir ro don ni bsgrub bya'o //
translated: The words are not, because the meaning is understood. The words are not, because the meaning is understood. This is because the speaker's intention depends on the desire to express. The meaning is the probandum.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya yang yin gyi sgrub par byed pa dran pa ste byed pas phan 'dogs par byed pa 'ba' zhig phyir rgol ba'i phyir tshig ma yin gyi rtogs par byed pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya yang yin gyi sgrub par byed pa dran pa ste byed pas phan 'dogs par byed pa 'ba' zhig phyir rgol ba'i phyir tshig ma yin gyi rtogs par byed pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Also means that memory is not only the means of accomplishing the probandum, but also the means of accomplishing the proof, because it is the means of accomplishing the benefit of the opponent, and thus it is not a statement, but only a means of understanding.

original: ma yin te tshig gis rjes su brjod pa zhes bya ba ni sngar gang la mthong ba de la dran pa skye bar byed do zhes bya ba'i rigs pa las so //
analyzed: ma yin te tshig gis rjes su brjod pa zhes bya ba ni sngar gang la mthong ba de la dran pa skye bar byed do zhes bya ba'i rigs pa las so //
translated: No, because it is said expressed by words, it is reasonable that memory arises in regard to what was seen before.

original: nye bar btags pa'i zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa'i zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That which is designated is inference, because it is the cause of inference.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang dran bzhin pa ma nges pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang dran bzhin pa ma nges pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: For that very reason means that it is not a valid cognition, because it is not a valid cognition, and because the present memory is uncertain.

original: dran pa la yang byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dran pa la yang byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not a valid cognition, because memory is also the agent.

original: nges pa ma yin na gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid dang / rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid kyang ji ltar yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: nges pa ma yin na gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid dang / rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid kyang ji ltar yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: If it is not certain, how can it be an inference for the sake of another, and how can it be the cause of inference?

original: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How then?

original: don la zhes bya ba ni rtags la'am gzhan la yang rung ste /
analyzed: don la zhes bya ba ni rtags la'am gzhan la yang rung ste /
translated: With regard to the object means either with regard to the reason or with regard to something else.

original: tshig de rang nyid las tshad ma ma yin gyi tshad ma la ni chad ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: tshig de rang nyid las tshad ma ma yin gyi tshad ma la ni chad ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: That statement is not a valid cognition in itself, but it is a valid cognition with regard to the valid cognition.

original: rtags dran par byed na tshig de tshad ma yin te de las gzhan du mi 'thad pas rtogs par byed pa yin gyi rjod par byed pa nyid kyis ma yin par bstan pa ni don la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtags dran par byed na tshig de tshad ma yin te de las gzhan du mi 'thad pas rtogs par byed pa yin gyi rjod par byed pa nyid kyis ma yin par bstan pa ni don la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it reminds one of the reason, that statement is a valid cognition, because it is not tenable in any other way. It is a means of understanding, not a means of expression. This is shown by the phrase with regard to the object.

original: de la yang mngon sum med par bstan pa ni tshad ma yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la yang mngon sum med par bstan pa ni tshad ma yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Moreover, it is shown that there is no perception with regard to that by the phrase even though there is no valid cognition.

original: sgrub pa ni rtogs pa ste 'on kyang nges par byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni rtogs pa ste 'on kyang nges par byed pa bzhin no //
translated: Proof is understanding, but like that which causes ascertainment.

original: dran pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: Memory is called inference.

original: nges pa ni zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa ni zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad rtogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAscertainment‚Äù means the realization of all aspects.

original: rjes su dpag pa la de ma yin pa las log par nges pa yin yang rang gi ngo bor nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la de ma yin pa las log par nges pa yin yang rang gi ngo bor nges pa ma yin te /
translated: Although there is ascertainment of the opposite of what is not the case in inference, there is no ascertainment of the nature of the object.

original: 'bad pa las bzhin du rtags tshig las kyang dran bzhin pa la ni tshad ma'i stobs kyis de las byung ba'i the tshom bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni tshig las don la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bad pa las bzhin du rtags tshig las kyang dran bzhin pa la ni tshad ma'i stobs kyis de las byung ba'i the tshom bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni tshig las don la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as with effort, when one is mindful of the reason, the power of valid cognition eliminates doubt arising from that, as indicated by ‚Äúfrom the words, regarding the meaning.‚Äù

original: rtog na zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'i ngo bo'i khyad par la ste log pas the tshom can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog na zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'i ngo bo'i khyad par la ste log pas the tshom can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen one conceives‚Äù means regarding the specific nature of the connection, because one is doubtful due to error.

original: tshig las dran pa'i the tshom sel bar byed pa ste nye bar bsdu ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshig las dran pa'i the tshom sel bar byed pa ste nye bar bsdu ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The elimination of doubt from memory of the words is the summary, indicated by ‚Äútherefore.‚Äù

original: don thob pa'i mtshan nyid de rgyu rtog pa gang gi yin pa de tha snyad yin gyi gzhan rtogs pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don thob pa'i mtshan nyid de rgyu rtog pa gang gi yin pa de tha snyad yin gyi gzhan rtogs pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: That which has the characteristic of obtaining the meaning is the cause of conception, and that is conventional, not just the mere understanding of something else.

original: slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis //
translated: The master [DignƒÅga] said:

original: phyogs chos 'brel pa bsgrub bya dag / brjod pa las gzhan spang bar bya //üîΩzhes @232a * //
analyzed: phyogs chos 'brel pa bsgrub bya dag / brjod pa las gzhan spang bar bya // zhes @232a * //
translated: The property of the position, the relation, and the probandum are to be stated, and nothing else is to be stated.

original: bya bas bsgrub par bya ba'i tshig sgrub par byed pa brjod pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: bya bas bsgrub par bya ba'i tshig sgrub par byed pa brjod pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the statement of the proof just the statement of the probandum?

original: brjod pa de nus pa med pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la gtan tshigs don gyi ni rtags kyi yul nyid kyis so //
analyzed: brjod pa de nus pa med pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la gtan tshigs don gyi ni rtags kyi yul nyid kyis so //
translated: How can that statement be powerless? The meaning of the reason is by the object itself.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni nus pa med pa'i bsgrub bya'i brjod ba sgrub byed du bshad pa ni slob dpon gyis so //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni nus pa med pa'i bsgrub bya'i brjod ba sgrub byed du bshad pa ni slob dpon gyis so //
translated: The master explains that the statement of the powerless probandum is the proof.

original: yang na de ni zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed do //
analyzed: yang na de ni zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed do //
translated: Or, ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the proof.

original: de brjod pa ni rtags so //
analyzed: de brjod pa ni rtags so //
translated: ‚ÄúIts statement‚Äù is the reason.

original: yul brjod pa yang gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig la so so ba yin gyi rjod pa'i khyab pa can la ni de'i khongs su gtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: yul brjod pa yang gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig la so so ba yin gyi rjod pa'i khyab pa can la ni de'i khongs su gtogs pa yin te /
translated: The statement of the object is only separate from the mere reason, but in the pervasion of the statement it is included in that.

original: 'gal ba nyid dogs pa bsal ba'i ched du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid dogs pa bsal ba'i ched du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is for the purpose of removing the doubt of contradiction.

original: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis so //
analyzed: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis so //
translated: The master says ‚Äúit is said.‚Äù

original: nged kyi ltar na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs don zhes bya ba bshad pa'o //
analyzed: nged kyi ltar na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs don zhes bya ba bshad pa'o //
translated: The phrase according to us is the explanation of the word reasoning.üîΩThe word useless is explained by the word stated.

original: 'di nus pa med pa yang yin la brjod pa yang yin pa bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nus pa med pa yang yin la brjod pa yang yin pa bshad pa ni /
translated: The word stated is explained by the word probandum.

original: bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word probandum is explained by the word stated.

original: brjod pa ni bcom ldan 'das chos kyi grags pas so //
analyzed: brjod pa ni bcom ldan 'das chos kyi grags pas so //
translated: The word stated is explained by the word Lord Dharmakƒ´rti.

original: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi dang 'gal bar ro //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi dang 'gal bar ro //
translated: The phrase but how? is the objection.

original: 'di ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: 'di ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The word not is the reply.

original: bsgrub bya'i tshig kyang yul nyid yin pas gtan tshigs dang 'brel ba'i phyir de'i tshig bzhin du nus pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i tshig kyang yul nyid yin pas gtan tshigs dang 'brel ba'i phyir de'i tshig bzhin du nus pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: The word probandum is the object itself, because it is related to the reason. Therefore, like the word reason, it is capable.

original: gal te de la'ang nus yod de //üîΩzhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i tshig la'o //
analyzed: gal te de la'ang nus yod de // zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i tshig la'o //
translated: If you think that, then the reply is If it is capable there.üîΩThe word there refers to the word probandum.

original: lan ni de ni zhes bya ba ste phyogs kyi tshig go //
analyzed: lan ni de ni zhes bya ba ste phyogs kyi tshig go //
translated: The word but is the reply.

original: the tshom gyis zhes bya ba ni rgyus so //
analyzed: the tshom gyis zhes bya ba ni rgyus so //
translated: The word doubt is the cause.

original: de nyid shes par 'dod pa can gyi nyan pa pos so //
analyzed: de nyid shes par 'dod pa can gyi nyan pa pos so //
translated: The word listener is the one who desires to know the truth.

original: rab tu byed pas te bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa rtsom pa 'dis yin pa'i phyir gnas skabs te gtan tshigs kyi tshig ni de'i rten du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu byed pas te bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa rtsom pa 'dis yin pa'i phyir gnas skabs te gtan tshigs kyi tshig ni de'i rten du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The occasion is the reason, because this composition, the means of establishing the probandum, is the basis of the reason.

original: de bzhin du mi mthun phyogs te phyogs snga ma khas len ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi mthun phyogs te phyogs snga ma khas len ba la yang ngo //
translated: Similarly, the opponent is the one who accepts the prima facie view.

original: the tshom za ba ma yin pa phyin ci log ma yin par gzung ba ni rigs pas nges par brtag pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: the tshom za ba ma yin pa phyin ci log ma yin par gzung ba ni rigs pas nges par brtag pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: The non-doubtful, non-erroneous object is not the domain of rational analysis.

original: de'i phyir de ste gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'jug par byed pa nyid kyi phyir nus pa nyid ni 'di dag gi mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa ste nus pa nyid la'o zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ste gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'jug par byed pa nyid kyi phyir nus pa nyid ni 'di dag gi mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa ste nus pa nyid la'o zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: Therefore, since the reason is the means of engaging in that, their equivalence is in their capacity. There is no infinite regress with respect to capacity. This is the position of the Jaina.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya la the tshom gyis shes par 'dod pa yin la the tshom de ni skabs kyi rten du 'gyur ba de bzhin du kha cig gis rtag pa yin pa'i phyogs khas len pa yin na yang byas pa ni mi rtag pa
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya la the tshom gyis shes par 'dod pa yin la the tshom de ni skabs kyi rten du 'gyur ba de bzhin du kha cig gis rtag pa yin pa'i phyogs khas len pa yin na yang byas pa ni mi rtag pa
translated: That is to be proven is asserted to be known by doubt, and that doubt is the basis of the context.

original: yin te / bum pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs brjod pa 'jug pa'i phyir de @232b dag gi tshig kyang byas pa nyid kyi tshig dang lhan cig sgrub byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: yin te / bum pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs brjod pa 'jug pa'i phyir de @232b dag gi tshig kyang byas pa nyid kyi tshig dang lhan cig sgrub byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: Similarly, if someone accepts the position that it is permanent, then the reason ‚Äúbecause it is produced‚Äù is stated, and the words of that reason become the proof together with the words ‚Äúbecause it is produced.‚ÄùüîΩThis is the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: the tshom la ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs par 'chad pa ni gzhan du ba'o //
analyzed: the tshom la ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs par 'chad pa ni gzhan du ba'o //
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúnot in doubt‚Äù and so on is different.

original: don zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: don zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is the intention.

original: bsgrub bya bsgrub pa la ni phyogs kyi tshig nye ba yin zhing the tshom la sogs pa ni ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya bsgrub pa la ni phyogs kyi tshig nye ba yin zhing the tshom la sogs pa ni ma yin pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
translated: Is it not the case that in proving the probandum, the words of the position are proximate and not doubt and so on?

original: nang gi yan lag ces bya ba ste 'brel pa la ltos nas tshul gsum pa'i rtags dang de'i tshig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nang gi yan lag ces bya ba ste 'brel pa la ltos nas tshul gsum pa'i rtags dang de'i tshig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The inner part is the reason that is the third member of the syllogism, in dependence upon the relation.

original: gtan tshigs las de ni ste bsgrub byar nges pa ste gdon mi za bar ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs las de ni ste bsgrub byar nges pa ste gdon mi za bar ro //
translated: The meaning of the words is that it is ascertained as the probandum from the reason, without a doubt.

original: phyis zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúafter‚Äù is the nature of a summary.

original: yod pa tsam las zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa nyid bsal ba las so //
analyzed: yod pa tsam las zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa nyid bsal ba las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom mere existence‚Äù is the exclusion of non-establishment.

original: ba lang dang 'dra ba'i phyir ni mngon sum las khyad par dang 'brel pa sgrub par te /
analyzed: ba lang dang 'dra ba'i phyir ni mngon sum las khyad par dang 'brel pa sgrub par te /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of being like a cow‚Äù is the establishment of the relation with the particular, from direct perception.

original: ji lta bur gyur pa'i ba lang yin pa de lta bur gyur pa ba men yin no zhes dran pa nyid du 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji lta bur gyur pa'i ba lang yin pa de lta bur gyur pa ba men yin no zhes dran pa nyid du 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the memory itself holds the relation, ‚ÄúThe cow that is such and such is the gayal that is such and such.‚Äù

original: gzhan ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di lta bu las gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di lta bu las gzhan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot other‚Äù is this kind of thing, not other than that.

original: byas pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs nyid kyis yin gyi bsgrub byas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs nyid kyis yin gyi bsgrub byas ni ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of being produced‚Äù is the reason itself, not the probandum,

original: rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be an inference.

original: byas pa nyid gnyis zhes bya ba ni sgra dang bum pa la yong pa'i mngon sum pa'o //
analyzed: byas pa nyid gnyis zhes bya ba ni sgra dang bum pa la yong pa'i mngon sum pa'o //
translated: The two kinds of ‚Äúhaving been made‚Äù are the direct perception of sound and the direct perception of a pot.

original: yang yan lag dang spyi sbyor ba ni rigs gzhan gyi de yin no zhes zer ba ni de la gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang yan lag dang spyi sbyor ba ni rigs gzhan gyi de yin no zhes zer ba ni de la gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Moreover, the application of parts and wholes is of a different type, he says.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba nyid khas mi len na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba nyid khas mi len na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means if one does not accept mere similarity.

original: rgyu nyid du zhes bya ba ni 'bras bus btags pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu nyid du zhes bya ba ni 'bras bus btags pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAs a cause‚Äù means as a designation by the effect.

original: rgyu yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan te /
analyzed: rgyu yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan te /
translated: ‚ÄúAlso as a cause‚Äù means as another.

original: mthong ba nyid ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba nyid ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSeeing‚Äù means understanding.üîΩ‚ÄúIs it not the case that the cognition of mere similarity is from a concept, not from mere similarity?‚Äù

original: 'dra ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i shes pa las 'dra ba nyid yin gyi rtog pa las ni ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gal te de la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i shes pa las 'dra ba nyid yin gyi rtog pa las ni ma yin nam zhes zer ba la gal te de la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf that is so‚Äù means if mere similarity is a concept.

original: 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa tsam yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúMere similarity‚Äù is mere conceptualization.

original: mngon sum la mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum la mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it does not appear to direct perception.

original: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni lta ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni lta ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Äù means in that case of seeing.

original: rnam par rtog pa tsam la rung ba nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa tsam la rung ba nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not even possible in mere conceptualization.

original: 'di 'dra ba yin no zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa la dngos po tsam du zhen pa'i phyir dang / gzhan par ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba yin no zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa la dngos po tsam du zhen pa'i phyir dang / gzhan par ma nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because the conceptualization ‚Äúit is like this‚Äù is the adherence to mere entity, and because it is not ascertained as other. This is taught in ‚Äúfrom the nature of the entity.‚Äù

original: dben par zhes bya ba ni bral bar te rtog pa la'am gzhan pa la'o //
analyzed: dben par zhes bya ba ni bral bar te rtog pa la'am gzhan pa la'o //
translated: ‚Äú In isolation‚Äù means in the absence of the conceptualization or of other.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni gzhan du mi 'thad pas mthong ba rjes su dpog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni gzhan du mi 'thad pas mthong ba rjes su dpog pa ma yin te /
translated: Since conceptualization is not tenable as other, seeing does not infer.

original: gzhan du yang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni thogs med ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du yang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni thogs med ces bya ba'o //
translated: Because it occurs even in the absence of the other, this is taught in ‚Äúwithout obstruction.‚Äù

original: de nyid du ni 'dra ba nyid kyi ngo bo @233a * //
analyzed: de nyid du ni 'dra ba nyid kyi ngo bo @233a * //
translated: In that very entity, in the nature of similarity.

original: nyid du'o // bag chags tsam las byung ba yang nyams su myong ba'i 'brel ba ci nas kyang tha snyad la dgos pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni dngos dang 'brel phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyid du'o // bag chags tsam las byung ba yang nyams su myong ba'i 'brel ba ci nas kyang tha snyad la dgos pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni dngos dang 'brel phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even arising from mere latent impressions is related to experience. In every way, it is necessary for conventions. This is taught in ‚Äúbecause of the relation to the entity.‚Äù

original: gal te nal byad ces bya ba ni 'dra ba dang cig shos las byung ba'i don gyi bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te nal byad ces bya ba ni 'dra ba dang cig shos las byung ba'i don gyi bya ba'o //
translated: If the so-called ‚Äúinferential mark‚Äù is the activity of the object that arises from the similar and dissimilar,

original: der yang zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba'i dngos po la yang ngo //
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba'i dngos po la yang ngo //
translated: then in that case, even in the case of a similar entity,

original: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni nang gi khyad par ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni nang gi khyad par ro //
translated: why is it not an inferential mark?

original: gzhan du yong pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'dra ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: gzhan du yong pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'dra ba rnams la'o //
translated: It is an inferential mark in the case of dissimilar entities.

original: lung gi tshad ma med par ni du ba la sogs pa las byung bas so //üîΩci ste zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs la'o //
analyzed: lung gi tshad ma med par ni du ba la sogs pa las byung bas so // ci ste zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs la'o //
translated: Without the valid cognition of scripture, it is from smoke and so on.üîΩIf so, then at that time,

original: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: the thesis is also in the case of others.

original: dam bca' ba de yang zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa'i yul la'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba de yang zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa'i yul la'o //
translated: That thesis is also in the case of one‚Äôs own desired object.

original: med na sgrub byed mi 'grub pa'i phyir sgrub byed kyi tshig bzhin du dam bca' ba'i tshig ni the tshom la sogs pa ma yin pa lta bu zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: med na sgrub byed mi 'grub pa'i phyir sgrub byed kyi tshig bzhin du dam bca' ba'i tshig ni the tshom la sogs pa ma yin pa lta bu zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Because without it, the proof is not established, the words of the thesis are not like the words of the proof.

original: gal te yul bstan med par ni //
analyzed: gal te yul bstan med par ni //
translated: If without indicating the object,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said.

original: the tshom la sogs pa'i yul bzhin du nang gi yan lag ma yin zhing de ma brjod na ma grub pa nyid dang 'gal ba nyid du dogs pa med do //
analyzed: the tshom la sogs pa'i yul bzhin du nang gi yan lag ma yin zhing de ma brjod na ma grub pa nyid dang 'gal ba nyid du dogs pa med do //
translated: It is not an internal part, like the object of doubt, etc. If it is not mentioned, there is no fear of contradicting the non-establishment.

original: khyab pa'i gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba la yang khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyab pa'i gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba la yang khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: And there is no difference in the contradiction with the pervading reason.

original: rang bzhin 'bras bu 'grub bya'i phyir //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'bras bu 'grub bya'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of establishing the nature and effect,

original: gtan tshigs gnyis dang bzlog pa gnyis //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis dang bzlog pa gnyis //
translated: there are two reasons and two reversals.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi ngo bo med pa phyogs ma yin par brjod pa bshad pa ni byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang mi rtag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi ngo bo med pa phyogs ma yin par brjod pa bshad pa ni byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang mi rtag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the absence of the nature of the property of the subject is not the subject is explained by because it is produced and because it is impermanent.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos gtso bo yin te gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid kyis phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi tshe snga na yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos gtso bo yin te gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid kyis phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi tshe snga na yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The probandum is primary, because at the time of the property of the subject, it is the object of the reason and precedes it.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba nas yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba nas yin no zhe na /
translated: If it were not so, then...

original: bstan na zhes bya ba'i bar du ni rgol ba rjes su brjod pa yin pa ni sgrub byed nyid gsal bar byed pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: bstan na zhes bya ba'i bar du ni rgol ba rjes su brjod pa yin pa ni sgrub byed nyid gsal bar byed pa'i don du'o //
translated: Up to ‚Äúif it is taught‚Äù is the opponent‚Äôs response, which is for the purpose of clarifying the proof.

original: tshad ma'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi 'thad pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe result of valid knowledge‚Äù is the reason for the proof.

original: de ni zug gzer la zhes bya ba ni bzhad dag du byed pa yin te sgra gzhan gyis de nyid brjod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni zug gzer la zhes bya ba ni bzhad dag du byed pa yin te sgra gzhan gyis de nyid brjod pa'i phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúThat is a pain in the stomach‚Äù is a laugh, because it expresses the same thing with different words.

original: khyab 'jug pa ni lto ba la sogs pa'i zug gzer la dbang phyug chen po par gyur pa'i 'jigs las 'khor lo'i sgras brjod kyi rtse gsum gyi sgras ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab 'jug pa ni lto ba la sogs pa'i zug gzer la dbang phyug chen po par gyur pa'i 'jigs las 'khor lo'i sgras brjod kyi rtse gsum gyi sgras ni ma yin no //

original: mngon sum la sogs pa bzhin du 'di brjod bya la tshad ma nyid yin na /
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa bzhin du 'di brjod bya la tshad ma nyid yin na /
translated: If this were a valid cognition with respect to the expressed meaning, like perception and so on,

original: sgrub par byed pa don med pa yin te de nyid las bsgrub bya 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'on te don nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa don med pa yin te de nyid las bsgrub bya 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'on te don nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: then the proof would be pointless, because the probandum would be established by that alone.

original: gzhan ni rigs pa'i sgo'i n'i k'a byed pa po'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni rigs pa'i sgo'i n'i k'a byed pa po'o //
translated: The other is the agent of the door of reasoning.

original: dam bca' ba zhes bya ba ni de'i sgrub byed brjod pa po'i'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba zhes bya ba ni de'i sgrub byed brjod pa po'i'o //
translated: The thesis is that of the one who states the proof.

original: sun 'byin par smra ba ni sgrub byed ma yin par smra ba'o //
analyzed: sun 'byin par smra ba ni sgrub byed ma yin par smra ba'o //
translated: The refutation is the statement that it is not a proof.

original: ltar snang ba'i tshig bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa yin na sgrub par mi byed pa'i shes pa'i bdag nyid nyid kyi mngon sum pa yang yod par bstan pa ni mngon sum @235a * //
analyzed: ltar snang ba'i tshig bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa yin na sgrub par mi byed pa'i shes pa'i bdag nyid nyid kyi mngon sum pa yang yod par bstan pa ni mngon sum @235a * //
translated: If the words that appear to be a proof of the probandum are not a proof, then even perception, which is not a cognition that establishes, would exist.

original: gyis zhes bya ba'o //üîΩlan gdab po zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa smra ba po'i'o //
analyzed: gyis zhes bya ba'o // lan gdab po zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa smra ba po'i'o //
translated: This is indicated by ‚Äúperception.‚ÄùüîΩThe reply is that of the one who states the proof.

original: sun 'byin pas zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed du smra ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sun 'byin pas zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed du smra ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: The refutation is not the statement of the proof.

original: khyad par gyi sgo nas lan na sun dbyung ba grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par gyi sgo nas lan na sun dbyung ba grub pa ma yin te /
translated: If you reply by way of a distinction, then the refutation is not established,

original: khyad par rnams la mtha' med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni su na 'byin par 'gyur ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par rnams la mtha' med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni su na 'byin par 'gyur ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because there is no end to distinctions. This is indicated by the words ‚Äúit is not a refutation.‚Äù

original: tshig ni ltar snang ba dang bcas pa nyid kyis sgrub byed yin zhing gnod par byed pas khyab pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir sgrub byed ma yin pa yang yin pa de'i phyir ma nges pa nyid du lan 'debs pa ni bzhad gad yin no //
analyzed: tshig ni ltar snang ba dang bcas pa nyid kyis sgrub byed yin zhing gnod par byed pas khyab pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir sgrub byed ma yin pa yang yin pa de'i phyir ma nges pa nyid du lan 'debs pa ni bzhad gad yin no //
translated: Since the words are not established as a proof because they are accompanied by a semblance of the reason, and since the pervasion is not established because they are undermined, they are not a proof. Therefore, it is laughable to reply that they are indefinite.

original: tshig nyid yin na zhes bya ba ni bzhad gad yin te khyad par gyis dngos su ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig nyid yin na zhes bya ba ni bzhad gad yin te khyad par gyis dngos su ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIf they are words‚Äù is laughable, because they are not directly a distinction.

original: gang gi zhe na gal te sgrub byed du smra ba'i yin na 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi zhe na gal te sgrub byed du smra ba'i yin na 'dod pa yin no //
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIf they are a proof,‚Äù then we agree.

original: sun 'byin par smra ba'i ji ltar yin zhe na de khas blangs pas dam pa ma yin par smra ba khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sun 'byin par smra ba'i ji ltar yin zhe na de khas blangs pas dam pa ma yin par smra ba khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIf they are a refutation,‚Äù then how is that? Because you accept that, you accept that you are speaking falsely.

original: de gnyi ga bstan pa na ma mthong ba tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: de gnyi ga bstan pa na ma mthong ba tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa'o //
translated: The commentary explains that ‚Äúmerely not seeing‚Äù refers to both of those.

original: bsgrub bya tsam gyi tshig ni nus pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya tsam gyi tshig ni nus pa med pa yin te /
translated: A statement that is merely the probandum is not a proof.üîΩIt follows that the reason is pointless in proving the probandum, and so on.

original: bsgrub bya ba sgrub pa la gtan tshigs don med par thal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid yin pa nyid yin na ltar snang bcas sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgrub byed nyid dang sgrub byed pa ma yin paüîΩnyid du nye bar bkod pa ni bzhad gang yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya ba sgrub pa la gtan tshigs don med par thal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid yin pa nyid yin na ltar snang bcas sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgrub byed nyid dang sgrub byed pa ma yin pa nyid du nye bar bkod pa ni bzhad gang yin te /
translated: The statement of a proof that is not a proof, such as ‚Äúbecause it is a phenomenon,‚Äù and so on, is laughable.

original: khyab pa med pas ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa med pas ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is inconclusive because it is not a pervasion.üîΩHere, the opponent‚Äôs response that it is not a proof because it is not a direct proof is laughable.

original: 'di la yang khyad par gyis lan du bzhed pa ni dngos su ba ma yin pa'i phyir bzhad gang yin no zhes bya ba'i don no zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang khyad par gyis lan du bzhed pa ni dngos su ba ma yin pa'i phyir bzhad gang yin no zhes bya ba'i don no zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the word ‚Äúindeed.‚Äù

original: slob dpon pa rnams kyis de'i tshig sgrub byed nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slob dpon pa rnams kyis de'i tshig sgrub byed nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The master BhƒÅviveka accepts that statement as a proof.

original: bsgrub brjod ces bya ba ste rtogs pa'i don ni khyab pa dang bcas pa can gyi sbyor ba la bsgrub byar rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub brjod ces bya ba ste rtogs pa'i don ni khyab pa dang bcas pa can gyi sbyor ba la bsgrub byar rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The so-called ‚Äúthesis‚Äù is the object of understanding, which is understood as the probandum in a syllogism that has a pervasion.

original: de la yang rmongs pa ni bsgrub bya la bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid dang / bsgrub bya ma yin pa la bsgrub bya nyid du rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang rmongs pa ni bsgrub bya la bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid dang / bsgrub bya ma yin pa la bsgrub bya nyid du rtogs pa'o //
translated: And in that regard, confusion is the understanding of the non-probandum as the probandum and the probandum as the non-probandum.

original: de sel bar byed pa'i ched du mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: de sel bar byed pa'i ched du mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: The definition is for the purpose of eliminating that.

original: de dag la bsgrub bya ma yin pa las bzlog pa'i rmongs pa ni gzhan gyi don tsam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag la bsgrub bya ma yin pa las bzlog pa'i rmongs pa ni gzhan gyi don tsam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The confusion about the non-probandum in those is called ‚Äúmere for the sake of others.‚Äù

original: bsgrub bya las bzlog pa ni bsgrub bya yin yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya las bzlog pa ni bsgrub bya yin yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The probandum is the opposite of the non-probandum.

original: de bsal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bsal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúFor the purpose of eliminating that‚Äù means for the purpose of eliminating the wrong understanding.

original: bsgrub bya dang cig shos kyi yul la log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir tshig re re zhing des par gzung ba'i sbyor pa @235b yin par bstan pa ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang cig shos kyi yul la log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir tshig re re zhing des par gzung ba'i sbyor pa @235b yin par bstan pa ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that each word is used for the purpose of eliminating the wrong understanding of the object of the probandum and the opposite is indicated by ‚Äúin the same way.‚Äù

original: ci zhig bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di nyid kyi 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di nyid kyi 'thad pa'o //
translated: What is to be done? etc. is the reason for this.

original: rtogs pa'i don can nyid khyab pa dang ldan pa yin yang sgra las de dang bral ba'i gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig yin na bsgrub bya dang cig shos bzlog pa'i the tshom za ba bzlog pas ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa dag bsal bar byed
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don can nyid khyab pa dang ldan pa yin yang sgra las de dang bral ba'i gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig yin na bsgrub bya dang cig shos bzlog pa'i the tshom za ba bzlog pas ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa dag bsal bar byed
translated: Even though the meaning of the word is pervaded by the meaning of the word, if the reason is only free from that in the word, then the doubt of the reversal of the probandum and the other is reversed. Therefore, the non-establishment, contradiction, and uncertainty are eliminated.

original: pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: The one with the suffix says, Because of that.

original: bsgrub bya ni spyi yin gyi rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir khyad par ma yin par brjod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: bsgrub bya ni spyi yin gyi rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir khyad par ma yin par brjod pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't the probandum a universal, not a particular, because it is not concomitant?

original: du ba ni me'i khyad par las spyir 'phen pa'i phyir sgrub byed yin la dngos su ni ma yin na 'dod pa smos pas de sel ba'i phyir /
analyzed: du ba ni me'i khyad par las spyir 'phen pa'i phyir sgrub byed yin la dngos su ni ma yin na 'dod pa smos pas de sel ba'i phyir /
translated: Since smoke is projected in general from the particular of fire, it is the probandum, not directly. But by mentioning the desire, that is eliminated.

original: ji ltar khyad par 'dzin pa yin //
analyzed: ji ltar khyad par 'dzin pa yin //
translated: How is it that it apprehends the particular?

original: zhes zer ba la ma brjod na yang zhes bya ba ste //
analyzed: zhes zer ba la ma brjod na yang zhes bya ba ste //
translated: To that, even though not stated is said.

original: brjod pa'i spyi'i rjes su 'gro ba'i dus na mthong ba'i khyad par gyi rigs 'phen pa yin gyi spyi'i khyad par la gzhan gtan ma mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brjod pa'i spyi'i rjes su 'gro ba'i dus na mthong ba'i khyad par gyi rigs 'phen pa yin gyi spyi'i khyad par la gzhan gtan ma mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that when the universal of expression is present, the particular of perception is projected, but the universal is not seen as absolutely different from the particular.

original: bsgrub byar zhes bya ba ni spyi gzhan gyi bdag nyid nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub byar zhes bya ba ni spyi gzhan gyi bdag nyid nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The probandum is the universal itself, because it does not have the nature of going to another.

original: gzhan ni spyi gnyis bdag nyid kyis te rang nyid smra ba gzhan gyi don tsam bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: gzhan ni spyi gnyis bdag nyid kyis te rang nyid smra ba gzhan gyi don tsam bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya bas so //
translated: The other is the universal itself, because the mere object of another‚Äôs statement is the probandum.

original: skabs su ma bab par zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skabs su ma bab par zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Not the occasion is because it is the occasion of one‚Äôs own purpose.

original: phyir rgol ba yang zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid du gnas skabs yin yang de'i bsam pa ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir rgol ba yang zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid du gnas skabs yin yang de'i bsam pa ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The opponent is because, even though it is the occasion of one‚Äôs own purpose, the intention of that is not ascertained.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni grub pa yin pa la rtsom pa'i phyir rang nyid kyis so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni grub pa yin pa la rtsom pa'i phyir rang nyid kyis so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, because of beginning what is established, it is one‚Äôs own, is the meaning.

original: de'i phyir rgol ba mi 'dod pa gzhan gyis 'dod pa ni rgol ba mi 'dod pa yin na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgol ba mi 'dod pa gzhan gyis 'dod pa ni rgol ba mi 'dod pa yin na'o //
translated: Therefore, if the opponent does not assert, then the assertion of another is not the assertion of the opponent.

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa smos pa las rjod pa tsam mi 'dod pa'i phyir rgol ba'i 'dod pa gsal bar byed na bstan bcos la 'dod pa la sogs pa gzhan gyi 'dod pa thams cad sel bar byed pa na rang nyid smos pas ciüîΩzhig bya snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa smos pa las rjod pa tsam mi 'dod pa'i phyir rgol ba'i 'dod pa gsal bar byed na bstan bcos la 'dod pa la sogs pa gzhan gyi 'dod pa thams cad sel bar byed pa na rang nyid smos pas ci zhig bya snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If he were to clarify the opponent's assertion by mentioning the assertion, since he does not assert mere expression, why does he mention himself when he refutes all the assertions of others, such as the assertion of the treatise?

original: bstan bcos khas len pa po de la 'dod pa ni 'dod pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba mi ldog pa'i rlom pa can la dogs pa'i gnas te bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir de la 'dod pa 'dod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: bstan bcos khas len pa po de la 'dod pa ni 'dod pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba mi ldog pa'i rlom pa can la dogs pa'i gnas te bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir de la 'dod pa 'dod pa kho na yin te /
translated: One might think that the assertion of the treatise-holder is just the assertion, but this is a doubtful point for one who is not free from the conceit of being the author of the treatise. Since he accepts the treatise, the assertion of that is just the assertion.

original: rang nyid mi 'dod kyang zhes bya ba'i log bar rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang nyid mi 'dod kyang zhes bya ba'i log bar rtogs pa'o //
translated: This is a misunderstanding of the phrase, although he does not assert himself.

original: 'di ltar lung dang 'gal ba ni mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal ba bzhin du rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de bsal ba'i don du rang nyid smos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar lung dang 'gal ba ni mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal ba bzhin du rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de bsal ba'i don du rang nyid smos pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the contradiction with scripture is not like the contradiction with direct perception, etc. Therefore, he mentions himself in order to eliminate that.

original: gal te yang 'grel par de ltar bstan pa @236a * //
analyzed: gal te yang 'grel par de ltar bstan pa @236a * //
translated: If it is taught in the commentary in this way,üîΩthen it would have a different meaning in the sutra.üîΩThis is called ‚Äúits meaning,‚ÄùüîΩbecause the meaning of that is stated in the treatise.

original: yin na yang mdo las ni don gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la 'di ni de don zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yin na yang mdo las ni don gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la 'di ni de don zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it were not so,üîΩthen if that were not refuted, it would not be a reason.üîΩEven if it exists or does not exist, it would not contradict the treatise.

original: de'i don ni bstan bcos las 'dod pa'i don rjod par byed pa ni 'grel par yang 'dod pa smos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i don ni bstan bcos las 'dod pa'i don rjod par byed pa ni 'grel par yang 'dod pa smos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of that is stated in the treatise, and the commentary also mentions the assertion.üîΩIf it were not so,

original: de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni de ma bzlog na gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni de ma bzlog na gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: then if that were not refuted, it would not be a reason.

original: yod dam med kyang bstan bcos dang 'gal bar mi 'gyur te /üîΩrang nyid kyi 'dod pa bsdus pa bstan bcos rnams su bzlog pa'i don yin gyi yan lag gi ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: yod dam med kyang bstan bcos dang 'gal bar mi 'gyur te /üîΩrang nyid kyi 'dod pa bsdus pa bstan bcos rnams su bzlog pa'i don yin gyi yan lag gi ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Even if it exists or does not exist, it would not contradict the treatise.üîΩThe meaning of that is stated in the treatise, and the commentary also mentions the assertion.üîΩIf it were not so,üîΩthen if that were not refuted, it would not be a reason.

original: yan lag nyid du slob dpon gyi 'dod pa shes pa yin par bstan pa ni de nyid 'dod pas khyab pa'i khyad par gyi yin par brjod pa chos dang chos ma yin pa can la ltos nas yin pa de'i phyir don so so pa yin no zhes bya
analyzed: yan lag nyid du slob dpon gyi 'dod pa shes pa yin par bstan pa ni de nyid 'dod pas khyab pa'i khyad par gyi yin par brjod pa chos dang chos ma yin pa can la ltos nas yin pa de'i phyir don so so pa yin no zhes bya
translated: The master's assertion that it is a part is taught to be a particular that is pervaded by the desire for that, and it is in dependence on the virtuous and nonvirtuous that it is said to be a particular meaning.

original: ba'i don to //
analyzed: ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is a particular meaning.

original: 'grel par ni gzhan de phyir rgol ba la ltos nas khyad par de 'dod pas ma brjod pa'i spyi bo'i ngo bo kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'grel par ni gzhan de phyir rgol ba la ltos nas khyad par de 'dod pas ma brjod pa'i spyi bo'i ngo bo kho na yin no //
translated: In the commentary, it is said that the other is the mere nature of the head, which is not stated because it is desired in dependence on the opponent.

original: ci'i don du zhe na mthong ba bsdus pa gzhan gyi don tsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ma bsdus pa la 'gal ba nyid dgod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i don du zhe na mthong ba bsdus pa gzhan gyi don tsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ma bsdus pa la 'gal ba nyid dgod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For what purpose? Because the inclusion of seeing is pervaded by the mere purpose of others, the contradiction is stated in the non-included.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: smra ba po'i tshig las 'dod pa'am cig shos rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: smra ba po'i tshig las 'dod pa'am cig shos rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't the desire or the other understood from the speaker's words?

original: de med na ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la ma brjod na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de med na ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la ma brjod na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that is not so, how is it? It is said that even if it is not stated, it is understood.

original: de bsgrub bya nyid yin na skyon ci yod nas gang gis bkag pa yin zhes zer ba la rjes 'gro med pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bsgrub bya nyid yin na skyon ci yod nas gang gis bkag pa yin zhes zer ba la rjes 'gro med pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that is the probandum, what is the fault? By what is it refuted?üîΩThe Master himself has shown that this fault is here.

original: skyon de 'di na slob dpon nyid kyis bstan pa yin par bstan pa ni bshad bzhin te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: skyon de 'di na slob dpon nyid kyis bstan pa yin par bstan pa ni bshad bzhin te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is shown by ‚Äúas it is being explained.‚Äù

original: de ma brjod na bzlog par bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ma brjod na bzlog par bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If that is not stated, it would not be the object of reversal. This is the meaning.üîΩThe objection to the thesis is also stated because that is the probandum.

original: 'dod pa la gnod pa yang de bsgrub bya nyid kho na'i phyir brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni der ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa la gnod pa yang de bsgrub bya nyid kho na'i phyir brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni der ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the thesis.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni gzhan nyid kyi don nyid tsam mo //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni gzhan nyid kyi don nyid tsam mo //
translated: ‚ÄúJust that‚Äù is just the meaning of ‚Äúotherness.‚Äù

original: tshul zhugs zhes bya ba ni ci la brten pa nyid de de la brtson pa'o //
analyzed: tshul zhugs zhes bya ba ni ci la brten pa nyid de de la brtson pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAdherence to the method‚Äù is just the basis of that, striving for that.

original: 'dod pa ni nang du brjod pa tsam yang gnas skabs pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dod pa ni nang du brjod pa tsam yang gnas skabs pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the thesis just a mere internal statement?

original: de ci las tha dad pa yin zhes zer ba la gal te gang la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ci las tha dad pa yin zhes zer ba la gal te gang la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: What is different from that?

original: gnas skabs pa'i rtsod pa'i gzhi ni bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas skabs pa'i rtsod pa'i gzhi ni bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The basis of the dispute is not the probandum. This is the difference.

original: rtsod pa med na yang bsgrub bya nyid la skyon bstan pa ni gzhan du na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa med na yang bsgrub bya nyid la skyon bstan pa ni gzhan du na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even when there is no dispute, the fault in the probandum itself is stated in the phrase ‚Äúotherwise.‚Äù

original: mi 'dod pa zhes pa zhes bya ba ni rgol ba po'i'o //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa zhes pa zhes bya ba ni rgol ba po'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot accepted‚Äù refers to the opponent.

original: 'bras med ni phyir rgol ba ste grub pa la bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras med ni phyir rgol ba ste grub pa la bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúFutile‚Äù refers to the respondent, because it proves what is already established.

original: 'grel par ni bdag nyid du @236b bsgrub par bya ba la ni 'gal ba dang mi 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'grel par ni bdag nyid du @236b bsgrub par bya ba la ni 'gal ba dang mi 'dod pa yin no //
translated: In the commentary, it is stated that in proving something for oneself, there is contradiction and what is not accepted.

original: gzhan gyi don tsam la ni 'bras bu med pa nyid dang / bsgrub bya ma grub pa nyid dag go zhes bya ba'i bstan pa ni de lta na ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don tsam la ni 'bras bu med pa nyid dang / bsgrub bya ma grub pa nyid dag go zhes bya ba'i bstan pa ni de lta na ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In proving something for the sake of others, there is futility and the non-establishment of the probandum. The statement ‚Äúin that case‚Äù is as follows.

original: khyab pa 'dzin pa'i dus na mthong ba'i khyad par gyi rigs nyid bzhin du'o //
analyzed: khyab pa 'dzin pa'i dus na mthong ba'i khyad par gyi rigs nyid bzhin du'o //
translated: Just as the specific type seen at the time of apprehending the pervasion.

original: khyad par 'di yang de nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par 'di yang de nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This difference is also just that. This is what is taught.

original: gal te gzhan grub na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te gzhan grub na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the other is established.

original: nye ba zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'i'o //
analyzed: nye ba zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'i'o //
translated: ‚Äú Proximity‚Äù means connection.

original: khyad par zhes bya ba ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya ba ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Distinctiveness‚Äù means excellence.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid do //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the very purpose of the self.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba ni brjod pa tsam la'o //üîΩbrjod pa'i shugs kyis rtogs par bya ba bsgrub par bya ba la skyon bstan nas /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba ni brjod pa tsam la'o // brjod pa'i shugs kyis rtogs par bya ba bsgrub par bya ba la skyon bstan nas /
translated: ‚Äú That which is intended to be expressed‚Äù means mere expression.üîΩHaving shown the fault in the probandum that is to be understood by the force of the expression,

original: de'i rtogs bya'i brjod pa nyid la bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i rtogs bya'i brjod pa nyid la bstan pa ni /
translated: he shows the fault in the expression itself that is to be understood.

original: 'dis ni gnyis bcas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni gnyis bcas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú This is the double‚Äù means that.

original: bum pa dang gnyis bcas nyid ni rtogs par bya bzhin par mi 'dod la sems pa can gyi bdag nyid kyi lus dang / gnyis bcas nyid na 'dod pa yin grang na //
analyzed: bum pa dang gnyis bcas nyid ni rtogs par bya bzhin par mi 'dod la sems pa can gyi bdag nyid kyi lus dang / gnyis bcas nyid na 'dod pa yin grang na //
translated: If the body of the intelligent self is not accepted as the double of the pot,

original: de ni dpe la ma grub po //
analyzed: de ni dpe la ma grub po //
translated: then that is not established in the example.

original: brjod pa dang ma brjod pa yang 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brjod pa dang ma brjod pa yang 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that both the expressed and the unexpressed are accepted as the probandum, but not the other.

original: rjes su 'gro med dang 'gal bdag //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro med dang 'gal bdag //
translated: Non-pervasion and contradiction.

original: ces bya ba ni bum pa ni bum pa nyid dang gnyis bcas nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ni rgol ba'i dang rjes su 'gro med pa ni phyir rgol ba'i'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bum pa ni bum pa nyid dang gnyis bcas nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ni rgol ba'i dang rjes su 'gro med pa ni phyir rgol ba'i'o //
translated: This is the opponent‚Äôs argument.

original: spyir zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung bas gnyis bcas nyid tsam te me nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: spyir zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung bas gnyis bcas nyid tsam te me nyid lta bu'o //
translated: The general is the mere duality of anything, like fire.

original: khyad par ni shugs kyis so //
analyzed: khyad par ni shugs kyis so //
translated: The particular is by implication.

original: khyad par yod na spyi bsgrub bya yin gyi de med na ni ma yin te rang nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par yod na spyi bsgrub bya yin gyi de med na ni ma yin te rang nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: If there is a particular, the general is the probandum, but if there is not, it is not, because it does not exist by itself. This is shown by ‚Äúthat itself.‚Äù

original: don gzhan med pa ci las yin //
analyzed: don gzhan med pa ci las yin //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat is the reason for the non-existence of a different object?‚Äù

original: zhes zer ba la lus zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes zer ba la lus zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the body.

original: gang gi phyir lus mi 'grub pa de'i phyir 'grub par bya ba yin no zhes zer ba la brjod byas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir lus mi 'grub pa de'i phyir 'grub par bya ba yin no zhes zer ba la brjod byas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because the body is not established, therefore it is to be established. This is said by ‚Äúthe expressed.‚Äù

original: yod par khyad par can gyi spyi bsgrub bya yin gyi gzhan khyad par med pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yod par khyad par can gyi spyi bsgrub bya yin gyi gzhan khyad par med pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The particular of existence is the probandum, not the other without particular. This is the meaning.

original: sems pa can gyi khyad par can de la spyis kyang yin pa ci las she na thabs yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sems pa can gyi khyad par can de la spyis kyang yin pa ci las she na thabs yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: What is the reason that the special mental subject is also by the universal? The method is said.

original: rgol ba po thabs la mkhas par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgol ba po thabs la mkhas par bya ba'i don to //
translated: The opponent is for the sake of being skilled in the method.

original: thabs mkhas pas bsgrub bya yin pa de'i tshe yang skyon yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas bsgrub bya yin pa de'i tshe yang skyon yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: When it is to be accomplished by skillful means, then the fault is shown:

original: 'di la spyi 'am zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la spyi 'am zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the universal, etc.

original: de zhes bya ba ni de med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid do //üîΩkhyad par 'phangs pa ni bsgrub bya nyid kyis da rtsva las byung ba la @237a * //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni de med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid do // khyad par 'phangs pa ni bsgrub bya nyid kyis da rtsva las byung ba la @237a * //
translated: That is said. That is not the non-arising of that.

original: sogs pa bzhin du ma grub na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sogs pa bzhin du ma grub na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The special is projected by the probandum. Like grass, etc., if it is not established, it does not exist.

original: dus dang yul gyi khyad par las de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba tha snyad kyi spyod yul nyid 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus dang yul gyi khyad par las de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba tha snyad kyi spyod yul nyid 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the special time and place, it becomes like that. Because of the change of the domain of conventional usage.

original: 'di nyid las zhes bya ba ni autpala ma yin pa nyid las so //
analyzed: 'di nyid las zhes bya ba ni autpala ma yin pa nyid las so //
translated: From this very thing, etc. From the non-blue lotus.

original: spyi med na khyad par gyi ngo bo ji ltar yin pa bstan pa ni spyi ma grub pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi med na khyad par gyi ngo bo ji ltar yin pa bstan pa ni spyi ma grub pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of how there is no difference without a universal is ‚ÄúIf the universal does not exist. . . ‚Äù

original: khyad par med pa'i spyi ni dngos po ma yin la bsgrub bya ma yin zhing sgrub byed kyang ma yin par bstan pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i spyi ni dngos po ma yin la bsgrub bya ma yin zhing sgrub byed kyang ma yin par bstan pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation that a universal without a difference is not a real entity, is not the probandum, and is not the probans is ‚ÄúTherefore. . . ‚Äù

original: dngos po gcig nyid la gang yang rung ba'i tshig rigs pa ma yin yang rung ba'i tshig rigs pa ma yin nam gnyi ga bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: dngos po gcig nyid la gang yang rung ba'i tshig rigs pa ma yin yang rung ba'i tshig rigs pa ma yin nam gnyi ga bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la /
translated: ‚Äú It is not correct to say that one real entity is both, because it is included in either one or the other. ‚Äù

original: phyogs nyid sgra la yod kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs nyid sgra la yod kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is ‚ÄúThe word ‚Äòonly‚Äô is in the thesis. . . ‚Äù

original: bden te ngo bo gcig la mi 'gal ba yin na zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bden te ngo bo gcig la mi 'gal ba yin na zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: ‚Äú That is true, but if there is no contradiction in one nature. . . ‚Äù

original: gnyis las zhes bya ba ste 'gal ba med pas rnam par brtag pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gnyis las zhes bya ba ste 'gal ba med pas rnam par brtag pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The explanation is ‚ÄúFrom two. . . ‚Äù Since there is no contradiction, the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is added.

original: nges pa'i zhes bya ba ni gzhan med na'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i zhes bya ba ni gzhan med na'o //
translated: ‚Äú If there is no other. . . ‚Äù

original: bum pa'i rigs la de nyid kyis gnyis bcas nyid du mi srid pa'i tshig ni skyes bu dang gnyis bcas nyid 'dod par smra ba yin te de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bum pa'i rigs la de nyid kyis gnyis bcas nyid du mi srid pa'i tshig ni skyes bu dang gnyis bcas nyid 'dod par smra ba yin te de bstan pa ni /
translated: The words ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù in the line ‚Äúbecause of that, duality is impossible in the case of a pot‚Äù refer to the assertion of the existence of a person and duality.

original: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is shown by the words ‚Äúin that way.‚Äù

original: de dang 'dra ba'i skyon yin pa'i phyir tshig gi phyogs gcig gis de las gzhan pa don med par 'phen pa ni thos pa'i don gyi go ba dang 'brel pa med pa mi rigs par bstan pa ni tshon po zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i skyon yin pa'i phyir tshig gi phyogs gcig gis de las gzhan pa don med par 'phen pa ni thos pa'i don gyi go ba dang 'brel pa med pa mi rigs par bstan pa ni tshon po zhes bya ba'o//
translated: Because of the fault of that, it is unreasonable to indicate by one part of a word that something else is meaningless. The words ‚Äúa fat man‚Äù show that it is unreasonable to connect the meaning of what is heard.

original: mi rtag pa nyid ni rang gi khyad par yod pas spyi yin zhing sgrub par byed pa srid pa yin gyi khyad par gzhan yod pas ma yin par bstan pa ni /üîΩsgra dang bum pa'i khyad par las //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid ni rang gi khyad par yod pas spyi yin zhing sgrub par byed pa srid pa yin gyi khyad par gzhan yod pas ma yin par bstan pa ni / sgra dang bum pa'i khyad par las //
translated: Impermanence is a universal because it has its own particularities, and it is possible to establish it. This is shown by the words ‚Äúnot because of the existence of another particularity.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúfrom the particularities of sound and pot‚Äù show that.

original: mtshungs zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid du'o //
analyzed: mtshungs zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don nyid du'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúsimilar‚Äù means ‚Äúfor the sake of oneself.‚Äù

original: ma yin 'jig pa grub pa yis //
analyzed: ma yin 'jig pa grub pa yis //
translated: The words ‚Äúnot because of the establishment of destruction‚Äù show that.

original: zhes bya ba ni bum pa la yod pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par gyis te bdag gi don nyid kyis khyad par grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bum pa la yod pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par gyis te bdag gi don nyid kyis khyad par grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is because impermanence, which exists in a pot, is not established as a particularity by its own purpose.

original: lus dang gnyis pa dang bcas pa bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid ma grub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lus dang gnyis pa dang bcas pa bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid ma grub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as the body is not established as having a second, impermanence is not established.

original: 'dus pa'i gzhan gyi don nyid ni 'dus pa gzhan la gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gi shugs kyis 'dus pa ma yin pa'i don gyis nyid ni khyad par yin la mi rtag pa nyid ni khyad par kho na las mthong ba ni de ma yin
analyzed: 'dus pa'i gzhan gyi don nyid ni 'dus pa gzhan la gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gi shugs kyis 'dus pa ma yin pa'i don gyis nyid ni khyad par yin la mi rtag pa nyid ni khyad par kho na las mthong ba ni de ma yin
translated: The purpose of the assembly is to exist in another assembly. By the force of this statement, the purpose of the non-assembly is a particularity. Impermanence is seen only from a particularity, not from that which is not.

original: pa las log pas spyi yin par yul la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: pa las log pas spyi yin par yul la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: By the particularities of object and so on, it is established as a universal, the opposite of that which is not.

original: de bzhin du bum pa ni bum pa nyid kyis gnyis pa dang bcas par 'gal ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bum pa ni bum pa nyid kyis gnyis pa dang bcas par 'gal ba'i phyir te /
translated: In the same way, a pot is contradictory to having a second by potness.

original: de lta bu'i lus @237b dang gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis tshig gi shugs kyis brjod pa yin pa de'i phyir skyon med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i lus @237b dang gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis tshig gi shugs kyis brjod pa yin pa de'i phyir skyon med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the body and the second are expressed by the force of the words, and therefore there is no fault.

original: yang ngo zhes bya ba ni de ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: yang ngo zhes bya ba ni de ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Again, ‚Äúno‚Äù is to be supplied.

original: mi rtag pa la sogs pa tshad mas grub pa nyid du bstan pa ni bum pa la zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la sogs pa tshad mas grub pa nyid du bstan pa ni bum pa la zhes bya'o //
translated: The demonstration that impermanence and so on are established by a valid cognition is ‚Äúa pot.‚Äù

original: mthong ba'i khyad par kho na de ma yin pa las bsgrub par bya ba yin par bstan pa ni gzhan nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'i khyad par kho na de ma yin pa las bsgrub par bya ba yin par bstan pa ni gzhan nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that the difference seen is to be established as not being that is ‚Äúotherness.‚Äù

original: 'di chos can yang yin la bum pa yang yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i bum pa log pa'o //
analyzed: 'di chos can yang yin la bum pa yang yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i bum pa log pa'o //
translated: Since it is the subject and also a pot, the pot to be established is negated.

original: skyes bus gnyis pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni tshig las yin gyi gzhan las ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bus gnyis pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni tshig las yin gyi gzhan las ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúA person with a second‚Äù is from the words, not from another.

original: dpe la de ma yin pa las log par mthong ba ma yin nam bsgrub bya ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe la de ma yin pa las log par mthong ba ma yin nam bsgrub bya ma yin te /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the example seen as not being that, but it is not the probandum.

original: grub pa'i phyir dpe can la mthong ba'i phyir de ma yin pa las log pas sam /
analyzed: grub pa'i phyir dpe can la mthong ba'i phyir de ma yin pa las log pas sam /
translated: Because of the establishment of the example, the probandum is established in the exemplification, because of the exclusion of non-example.

original: gzhan du yang rung ji ltar bsgrub bya yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du yang rung ji ltar bsgrub bya yin te /
translated: Or else, how can the probandum be established in another?

original: rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni mi rtag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni mi rtag ces bya ba'o //
translated: Because of the perception of the pervasion, which is the perception of the concomitance.

original: dpe la yod pa nyid du grub pa dpe can la yod pa grub par bya ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: dpe la yod pa nyid du grub pa dpe can la yod pa grub par bya ba nyid du'o //
translated: The establishment of the existence of the example is the establishment of the existence of the exemplification.

original: ma yin pa ni tha dad pa yin pa ste /üîΩchos kho na zhes bya ba'i nges pa gzung bas mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir bsdus pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni mi ldan dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ma yin pa ni tha dad pa yin pa ste / chos kho na zhes bya ba'i nges pa gzung bas mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir bsdus pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni mi ldan dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Non-example is difference.üîΩThe inclusion is shown by the specification ‚Äúonly the property,‚Äù because the exclusion of non-possession is understood.üîΩThe inclusion is shown by the specification ‚Äúonly the property,‚Äù because the exclusion of non-possession is understood.

original: dpe can dang thun mong ba nyid du rtogs pa la dpe dang thun mong ba rtogs pa rjes su 'jug pa kho na yin pa de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba'i nus pas rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dpe can dang thun mong ba nyid du rtogs pa la dpe dang thun mong ba rtogs pa rjes su 'jug pa kho na yin pa de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba'i nus pas rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The understanding of the commonality with the exemplification is the understanding of the commonality with the example. Therefore, the inference is by the power of the pervasion. This is the meaning.

original: nges par gzung ba'i don gcig la 'di rnam par dbye ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i don gcig la 'di rnam par dbye ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How can there be a division of a single object of ascertainment?

original: bsdus pa dang gzhan yang yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bsdus pa dang gzhan yang yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The reply is:

original: rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The division is twofold.

original: yul gyi dbye ba las nges par bzung ba'i rnam par dbye ba yin la /
analyzed: yul gyi dbye ba las nges par bzung ba'i rnam par dbye ba yin la /
translated: The division of the object of ascertainment is made by way of the division of the object.

original: yul ni chos dang chos can no //
analyzed: yul ni chos dang chos can no //
translated: The object is the property-possessor and the property.

original: chos can dang 'brel pa'i chos la nges par gzung ba yin na /
analyzed: chos can dang 'brel pa'i chos la nges par gzung ba yin na /
translated: If the object of ascertainment is the property in relation to the property-possessor,üîΩthen there is no division at all.

original: rnam par dbye ba med pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la mi ldan gcod phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba med pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la mi ldan gcod phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The reply is: ‚Äúin order to eliminate non-possession.‚Äù

original: rnam par dbye ba byas pa'i 'brel pa nyid nges par bzung ba'i don yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba byas pa'i 'brel pa nyid nges par bzung ba'i don yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the object of ascertainment is the relation itself, which is divided.

original: dpe la gnod pas nges bzhin pa dang ldan pa ni de dang gzhan la yang rjes su dpag pa las khyad par can du rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpe la gnod pas nges bzhin pa dang ldan pa ni de dang gzhan la yang rjes su dpag pa las khyad par can du rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply to the objection that the example is faulty is stated in the line beginning ‚ÄúIf you say . . . ‚Äù

original: khyad par med pa bsdus pa khyad par dang 'gal pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par med pa bsdus pa khyad par dang 'gal pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The statement, The inclusion without distinction contradicts the distinction,
