analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spyi dang khyad par la zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is to be construed with ‚Äúin regard to the universal and the particular.‚Äù

original: chang mi 'thung ba la sogs pa chang 'thung ba la sogs pa ma yin pa ste skyabs yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: chang mi 'thung ba la sogs pa chang 'thung ba la sogs pa ma yin pa ste skyabs yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúNot drinking wine, etc.‚Äù means not drinking wine, etc., and is to be construed with ‚Äúis a refuge.‚Äù

original: rna ba'i dbang pos gzung ba mnyan par bya ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la yang de sgrub byed kyi gnod pa nyid brjod pa'i phyir thams cad 'thad pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni rnam kun zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i dbang pos gzung ba mnyan par bya ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la yang de sgrub byed kyi gnod pa nyid brjod pa'i phyir thams cad 'thad pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni rnam kun zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the proof of ‚Äúwhat is to be heard, which is apprehended by the auditory faculty,‚Äù etc., in order to demonstrate that everything is tenable, he says, ‚Äúin every way,‚Äù because the refutation of the proof is stated.

original: de la phan pa'i rkyen ni 'brel pa nyid brjod pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: de la phan pa'i rkyen ni 'brel pa nyid brjod pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: There, the condition that is helpful is not the mere relation, but rather

original: de las khyad par can no //
analyzed: de las khyad par can no //
translated: the particular from that.

original: de la ste dbang po la brten pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid grub pas ni shes pas so //
analyzed: de la ste dbang po la brten pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid grub pas ni shes pas so //
translated: Since it is established as the nature of non-duality because it depends on the sense faculty, it is known.

original: de'i ste sgrub byed kyi stobs kyis gnod pa nyid kyi phyir brjod par rigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ste sgrub byed kyi stobs kyis gnod pa nyid kyi phyir brjod par rigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is harmed by the power of the proof, it is reasonable to express it.

original: gzhan gyis te rang gi mtshan nyid la sogs pas 'di yang de'i ngo bo bzhin du brjod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis te rang gi mtshan nyid la sogs pas 'di yang de'i ngo bo bzhin du brjod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: The other, such as its own characteristic, is also not expressed as its nature, says the one with the suffix.

original: grub pas te don la de lta bu'i ngo bo yin na de la ste dbang po'i shes pa la brten pa'i phyir ma yin no zhes kyang bshad do //
analyzed: grub pas te don la de lta bu'i ngo bo yin na de la ste dbang po'i shes pa la brten pa'i phyir ma yin no zhes kyang bshad do //
translated: If the object has such a nature, it is not established because it depends on the sense consciousness, it is also explained.

original: grub pas zhes bya ba ni tshad mas so //
analyzed: grub pas zhes bya ba ni tshad mas so //
translated: Established means by valid cognition.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From that means

original: gnod byed nyid la brten pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gnod byed nyid la brten pa'i phyir //
translated: because it depends on the harm itself.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'grel par ro //
translated: This is in the commentary.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: sgra rang gi mtshan nyid kyi sgra yang rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang mnyan par bya ba'i sgra dag la khyad par med par brjod pa ni dgos pa byas pa lta bur ma yin pa de'i phyir bsam parüîΩbya ba min no //
analyzed: sgra rang gi mtshan nyid kyi sgra yang rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang mnyan par bya ba'i sgra dag la khyad par med par brjod pa ni dgos pa byas pa lta bur ma yin pa de'i phyir bsam par bya ba min no //
translated: The sound of the intrinsic identity of sound is also called ‚Äúthe one that is expressed,‚Äù etc. There is no difference between the sound of intrinsic identity and the sound that is heard. Therefore, it is not to be contemplated.

original: rjod byed kyi ngo bo ma yin pa ni nye bar brjod pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rjod byed kyi ngo bo ma yin pa ni nye bar brjod pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa'o //
translated: The intrinsic identity of the one that is expressed is not the intrinsic identity of the one that expresses.

original: yod pa nyid ces bya ba ni 'ji ba'i gong bu dang gong bu dag gi gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: yod pa nyid ces bya ba ni 'ji ba'i gong bu dang gong bu dag gi gnas skabs la'o //
translated: ‚Äú Existence‚Äù refers to the state of the lump of clay and the lumps of clay.

original: mi gsal ba ni ma dmigs pa yin te snang du rung ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir med pa'i de nyid yin la de 'dis ma mtshon pa dang rtag pa nyid la yang thams cad kyi lus la sogs pa'i ngo bo 'dzin pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan
analyzed: mi gsal ba ni ma dmigs pa yin te snang du rung ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir med pa'i de nyid yin la de 'dis ma mtshon pa dang rtag pa nyid la yang thams cad kyi lus la sogs pa'i ngo bo 'dzin pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan
translated: ‚Äú Unclear‚Äù is non-observation. Since the suitable to appear is not observed, it is the reality of non-existence. This is not indicated by that. And also, in the case of permanence, it is taught that it is contradictory to hold the nature of all bodies, etc.:

original: pa ni / de lta yin na rgyu rnams ni //
analyzed: pa ni / de lta yin na rgyu rnams ni //
translated: If that were the case, the causes

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: would be permanent.

original: 'bras bu snga na grub pa yod na yang rgyu rnams gsal bar byed pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni gsal bar byed do zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu snga na grub pa yod na yang rgyu rnams gsal bar byed pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni gsal bar byed do zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is the clarifier‚Äù is the response to that.üîΩSince it is the power of that which does not exist, it is the effect of that, and it is taught that it arises from that.

original: med pa nyid la ni de'i dbang yin pas de'i 'bras bu yin te de las skyes pa nyid de yin par bstan pa ni rdza mkhan sogs @258b zhes bya'o /
analyzed: med pa nyid la ni de'i dbang yin pas de'i 'bras bu yin te de las skyes pa nyid de yin par bstan pa ni rdza mkhan sogs @258b zhes bya'o /
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe potter, etc.‚Äù is the response to that.

original: rdza mkhan gyi byed pa'i de ma thag tu snang ba ni 'ji ba'i gong bu la bar du chod kyang ma mthong ba yod par khas len na /
analyzed: rdza mkhan gyi byed pa'i de ma thag tu snang ba ni 'ji ba'i gong bu la bar du chod kyang ma mthong ba yod par khas len na /
translated: If it is accepted that the appearance of the effect immediately after the activity of the potter is seen to exist even when there is an obstruction of the lump of clay,

original: bong bu'i rva yang yod par 'gyur bar byed pa yin par bstan pa ni rdul phran brgyud dag tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bong bu'i rva yang yod par 'gyur bar byed pa yin par bstan pa ni rdul phran brgyud dag tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the horn of a donkey would also exist, and the statement ‚Äúthe series of subtle particles‚Äù is the response to that.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni snang med pa byung ba na'o//
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni snang med pa byung ba na'o//
translated: The statement ‚Äúotherwise‚Äù is the response to the appearance of that which does not exist.

original: med pa ri bong gi rva la sogs pa rgyu ma yin mod kyang /
analyzed: med pa ri bong gi rva la sogs pa rgyu ma yin mod kyang /
translated: Although the nonexistent horn of a rabbit, etc., is not a cause,

original: ri bong gi rva'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs par bstan pa ni de de la yod ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs par bstan pa ni de de la yod ces bya ba ste /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúIt is not the cause of the rabbit‚Äôs horns‚Äù is the teaching of the impossibility of that.

original: ri bong gi sva gsal ba de la'o //
analyzed: ri bong gi sva gsal ba de la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the rabbit‚Äôs horns.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni gong bu'i'o /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni gong bu'i'o /
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to the lump of clay.

original: de skyed med par zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
analyzed: de skyed med par zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs position is stated in the words ‚Äúif it does not produce it.‚Äù

original: med 'dod la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
analyzed: med 'dod la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
translated: The response is stated in the words ‚Äúif you accept that it does not exist.‚Äù

original: de lta min na zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin na'o //
analyzed: de lta min na zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin na'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúif it does not exist‚Äù mean if it does not exist.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni nus pa can nyid la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni nus pa can nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the capacity.

original: de zhes bya ba ni bum pa la'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni bum pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to the pot.

original: yod par zhes bya ba ni 'ji ba'i gong bu la'o //
analyzed: yod par zhes bya ba ni 'ji ba'i gong bu la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt exists‚Äù refers to the lump of clay.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni skye ba las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni skye ba las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù refers to production.

original: de yin na ni yod pa dang 'brel pa ma bzung na ji ltar rtogs par byed /
analyzed: de yin na ni yod pa dang 'brel pa ma bzung na ji ltar rtogs par byed /
translated: If it is that, how can one understand it if one does not apprehend its relation to existence?

original: don gyi go ba las kyang de lta ma yin par bstan pa ni yod pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gyi go ba las kyang de lta ma yin par bstan pa ni yod pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is not so even from the understanding of the meaning is ‚Äúif it is not related to existence.‚Äù

original: rgyu nyid las bzhin du yod pa las kyang 'bras bu la snga na yong par khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu nyid las bzhin du yod pa las kyang 'bras bu la snga na yong par khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is: ‚ÄúHow could it be the effect of that?‚Äù

original: de dang 'brel pa las 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dang / de'i 'bras bu yin pa ni 'bras gang gang zhig ces bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa las 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dang / de'i 'bras bu yin pa ni 'bras gang gang zhig ces bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: Because it is related to that, it is the effect. And because it is the effect of that, it is the effect of that.

original: gang gi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pa de yod pa sngon du 'gro ba can de yin no //üîΩsnyam du sems pa ni de yong ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pa de yod pa sngon du 'gro ba can de yin no // snyam du sems pa ni de yong ces bya ba'o //
translated: That which is the effect of that exists prior to it.üîΩThe response to that is: ‚ÄúHow could it be the effect of that?‚Äù

original: 'bras bu de de nyid kyi 'bras bu ji ltar yin rang nyid kyis rang nyid 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: 'bras bu de de nyid kyi 'bras bu ji ltar yin rang nyid kyis rang nyid 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: How could that effect be the effect of that? It is not the effect of itself.

original: gzhan bzhin zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu yod pa las gzhan pa ni rdza mkhan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan bzhin zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu yod pa las gzhan pa ni rdza mkhan la sogs pa'o //
translated: The response to that is: ‚ÄúLike another.‚Äù Another is the potter, etc.

original: ci las she na nus pa las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci las she na nus pa las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: From what? From the capacity.

original: nus pa ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin te gzhan gyi ngo bo nyid la 'bras bur nges pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin te gzhan gyi ngo bo nyid la 'bras bur nges pa'o //
translated: Potency is the nature of the effect, because it is ascertained as the effect in the nature of another.

original: 'bras bu kho na la nus pa nyid du skye bar byed pa yin par bstan pa ni tha dad med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu kho na la nus pa nyid du skye bar byed pa yin par bstan pa ni tha dad med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is produced as potency itself in the effect is ‚Äúif there is no difference.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu yod na de skyed par byed ma yin na'o /
analyzed: 'bras bu yod na de skyed par byed ma yin na'o /
translated: If the effect exists, it is not produced.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: gsal ba yin par zer ba ni //
analyzed: gsal ba yin par zer ba ni //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is said to be manifest‚Äù is

original: gal te nus la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te nus la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúif from potency.‚Äù

original: nus las ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo las so //
analyzed: nus las ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo las so //
translated: From potency, from the nature of the effect.

original: gzhan nam ci ni gzhan ma yin pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan nam ci ni gzhan ma yin pa yin la /
translated: What else is it? It is not different.

original: de yang bskyed bya ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang bskyed bya ma yin te /
translated: And that is not produced,

original: @259a * // nus pa nyid bzhin du sngon nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @259a * // nus pa nyid bzhin du sngon nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists prior to potency itself.

original: gal te gzhan yod na bskyed bya ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te gzhan yod na bskyed bya ma yin te /
translated: If it is different, it is not produced,

original: yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it exists.

original: gsal ba blo zhes bya bas 'di nyid bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba blo zhes bya bas 'di nyid bshad pa yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúmanifestation is cognition‚Äù explains this.

original: myong zhes bya ba ni sems pa can no //
analyzed: myong zhes bya ba ni sems pa can no //
translated: ‚ÄúExperience‚Äù is the experiencer.

original: des na 'bras bu dang 'brel pa can ni byed pa po'i byed pa po gsal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba yin te /
analyzed: des na 'bras bu dang 'brel pa can ni byed pa po'i byed pa po gsal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, the conclusion is that the agent of the agent is not the manifest that is related to the effect.

original: snga ma yod pa la tshang ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma yod pa la tshang ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the prior existence of the effect is not established.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEverything‚Äù is the inference of impermanence.

original: rang gi bdag nyid kyi chos kyi chos can yin gyi gzhan gyis ma yin pa'i phyir shugs kyis grub na rang gi chos can la zhes bya bas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid kyi chos kyi chos can yin gyi gzhan gyis ma yin pa'i phyir shugs kyis grub na rang gi chos can la zhes bya bas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba la /
translated: If it is established by implication because the subject is a phenomenon that is of its own nature and not of another, then what is the point of saying ‚Äúwith respect to its own subject‚Äù?

original: kun du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: kun du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEverywhere‚Äù is the reply.

original: bstan bcos su rigs pa 'di grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don gyis rgol ba yin pa'am /
analyzed: bstan bcos su rigs pa 'di grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don gyis rgol ba yin pa'am /
translated: The treatise establishes this reasoning.

original: 'di ni grub pa'i mtha' kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni grub pa'i mtha' kho na yin te /
translated: This is the conclusion alone,

original: chos gzhan dang ldan pa nyid kyis chos can bsal ba'i don can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'grel par ro //
analyzed: chos gzhan dang ldan pa nyid kyis chos can bsal ba'i don can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'grel par ro //
translated: because the meaning of ‚Äúwith respect to its own subject‚Äù is to eliminate the subject that possesses another property.

original: grub pa'i nye bar dgong pa ci'i phyir yin zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i nye bar dgong pa ci'i phyir yin zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: Why is it that the established is not refuted? This is the opponent's position.

original: de zhes bya ba ni sgrub par 'dod pa'o //üîΩchos can gzhan bsal bar bya ba'i ched du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni sgrub par 'dod pa'o // chos can gzhan bsal bar bya ba'i ched du ni ma yin te /
translated: The word that refers to the probandum.

original: 'o na ci zhe na chos can de nyid chos gzhan gyi chos can gzhan yin pa'i'o zhes bstan pa ni de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na chos can de nyid chos gzhan gyi chos can gzhan yin pa'i'o zhes bstan pa ni de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o//
translated: It is not for the purpose of eliminating another subject, but rather for the purpose of eliminating another property of that subject. The word however indicates that even so, the subject is not eliminated.

original: chos can gzhan yang chos can de nyid yin pas gnod par ma yin na /
analyzed: chos can gzhan yang chos can de nyid yin pas gnod par ma yin na /
translated: If another subject is the same as that subject, it is not refuted.

original: ji ltar skyong min med pa yin //üîΩzhes zer ba la gzhan du zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar skyong min med pa yin // zhes zer ba la gzhan du zhes bya ba ste /
translated: How is it that it is not refuted?

original: chos gzhan dang chos can la gnod pa yin na /
analyzed: chos gzhan dang chos can la gnod pa yin na /
translated: The word elsewhere means that if another property and another subject are refuted,

original: rang gi chos kyis chos can la gnod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi chos kyis chos can la gnod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the property of that subject is refuted. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar bkod nas lan 'debs pa ni don 'di zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar bkod nas lan 'debs pa ni don 'di zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Having thus set forth the opponent's position, the reply is given: This is the meaning.

original: rang gi chos bzhin du chos can yang bsal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi chos bzhin du chos can yang bsal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as the property is eliminated, the subject is also eliminated. This is the meaning.

original: de bsal bas de la brten pa yang bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bsal bas de la brten pa yang bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that by refuting the property of the subject, the property to be established is also refuted.

original: rten ni zhes bya ba'o //üîΩchos can la yang gnod pa'i skyon ni chos nyid la brgyud pas nye bar gnod pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i ched du rang gi chos can smos pa yin par bstan pa ni gzhan du zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rten ni zhes bya ba'o // chos can la yang gnod pa'i skyon ni chos nyid la brgyud pas nye bar gnod pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i ched du rang gi chos can smos pa yin par bstan pa ni gzhan du zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The basis, etc.üîΩThe property of the subject is mentioned in order to show that the fault of refuting the property of the subject also indirectly refutes the property itself, but not otherwise.üîΩThe word ‚Äúelsewhere‚Äù is stated to show that even though there is no contradiction in the basis,

original: rten pa la 'gal ba med kyang ngo //
analyzed: rten pa la 'gal ba med kyang ngo //
translated: the property of the subject is refuted.

original: de lta'i rnam can zhes bya ba ni chos can la bsgrub byar ro //
analyzed: de lta'i rnam can zhes bya ba ni chos can la bsgrub byar ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúhaving such a form‚Äù means that the property of the subject is the probandum.

original: chos can tsam gyi gnod pa yang de gnod nyid ni chos can la gnod par sems pa ste /
analyzed: chos can tsam gyi gnod pa yang de gnod nyid ni chos can la gnod par sems pa ste /
translated: The fault of refuting the property of the subject is also considered to be a fault of refuting the property itself.

original: @259b chos tsam gyi gnod pa ni chos la gnod pa ni med byed na de la gnod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: @259b chos tsam gyi gnod pa ni chos la gnod pa ni med byed na de la gnod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The fault of refuting the property is not a fault of refuting the property of the subject.

original: de ltar kha cig dag gi log par rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar kha cig dag gi log par rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that this is a misconception of some.

original: 'ga' zhig chos can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig chos can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Some say that the property of the subject, etc.

original: dper na mkha' sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na mkha' sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúspace‚Äù and so on.

original: / med par dgag pas bsgrub pa ni de dang 'gal bas chos can la 'gal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / med par dgag pas bsgrub pa ni de dang 'gal bas chos can la 'gal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The proof by a non-implicative negation is not contradictory to the subject, because it is contradictory to that.

original: de lta na dngos po ma yin pa nyid la bsgrub bya'am sgrub byed kyi gnod pa ma yin te bkag pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na dngos po ma yin pa nyid la bsgrub bya'am sgrub byed kyi gnod pa ma yin te bkag pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, it is not the case that there is a refutation of the probandum or the proof in the case of non-entityness, because it is a mere negation.

original: chos can mi gnod na chos tsam la gnod pa yin yang bsgrub bya'i chos la skyong 'ga' yang med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: chos can mi gnod na chos tsam la gnod pa yin yang bsgrub bya'i chos la skyong 'ga' yang med par bstan pa ni /
translated: If there is no refutation of the subject, then even if there is a refutation of the mere property, there is no refutation of the probandum at all.

original: chos can 'ba' zhig la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos can 'ba' zhig la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is indicated by ‚Äúonly the subject.‚Äù

original: bsgrub bya'i chos las gzhan pa'i chos kyi chos can gnod pa skyong can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos las gzhan pa'i chos kyi chos can gnod pa skyong can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The subject is not refuted, because it is different from the probandum.

original: yang na zhes pa bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes pa bya ba'o //
translated: This is indicated by ‚Äúor.‚Äù

original: skabs kyi ma yin pa ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: skabs kyi ma yin pa ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: The non-property is impermanence.

original: ji ltar yan lag can gcig po yan lag du ma la khyab pa de bzhin du nam mkha' yang dngos po du ma la khyab pa can rtag pa yin no snyam du sems pa la snam bu la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar yan lag can gcig po yan lag du ma la khyab pa de bzhin du nam mkha' yang dngos po du ma la khyab pa can rtag pa yin no snyam du sems pa la snam bu la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as the single possessor of parts pervades many parts, so also space, which is a pervader of many things, is permanent.

original: drangs pa ni mang po dag gis phan tshun du'o //
analyzed: drangs pa ni mang po dag gis phan tshun du'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù refers to many things.

original: rtsom par mi byed pa'i drangs pa yin yang so so bar 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtsom par mi byed pa'i drangs pa yin yang so so bar 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though the pervader is not a creator, it is not the case that it is not individual.

original: mgrin pa'i sbubs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i sbubs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the phrase ‚Äúthe cavity of the throat.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'i'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'i'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúother‚Äù refers to the Buddhist.

original: chos can dang chos kyang bsgrub bya yin gyi de la chos bzhin du chos can tsam la gnod pa yang skyon can kho na ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: chos can dang chos kyang bsgrub bya yin gyi de la chos bzhin du chos can tsam la gnod pa yang skyon can kho na ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
translated: The subject and the predicate are the probandum. Is it not the case that, just as in the case of the predicate, the subject alone is also faulty when it is undermined?

original: 'dis ni gnyi ga zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni gnyi ga zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúboth‚Äù refers to this.üîΩThe subject is not intended to be known just as the predicate is.

original: chos bzhin du chos can ni shes par 'dod pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: chos bzhin du chos can ni shes par 'dod pa ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: de la dgongs pa can nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de la dgongs pa can nyid kyis so //
translated: It is intended in that way.

original: gnod pa yang de lta bu nyid kyis skyon can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnod pa yang de lta bu nyid kyis skyon can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the fault is just like that.

original: de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba ni de la dgongs pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba ni de la dgongs pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Just like that means just that is intended.

original: 'ba' zhig ni dgongs pa can ma yin pa'i gnon pa ni skyon can ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni dgongs pa can ma yin pa'i gnon pa ni skyon can ma yin no //
translated: Only means that the fault is not that which is not intended.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlog par byed pa'o //
translated: Not means that if, etc., is a reversal.

original: sgrub byed thams cad la chos can yang bsgrub bya dang rjes su mthun pa yin la /
analyzed: sgrub byed thams cad la chos can yang bsgrub bya dang rjes su mthun pa yin la /
translated: In all proofs, the subject is also in accordance with the probandum.

original: de dang 'gal ba can ma yin pa nyid grub par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba can ma yin pa nyid grub par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration of the establishment of that which is not contradictory with it is:

original: gal te chos can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te chos can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the subject, etc.

original: gal te ma mkha' la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis sgro btags pa'i khyad par dang bral @260a * //
analyzed: gal te ma mkha' la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis sgro btags pa'i khyad par dang bral @260a * //
translated: If space, etc., are devoid of the distinctions superimposed by the co-producing factors,

original: na ni med par grub kyang skyon ma yin na bde ba la sogs pa yang de ltar grub na med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: na ni med par grub kyang skyon ma yin na bde ba la sogs pa yang de ltar grub na med par 'gyur te /
translated: then even if established as non-existent, it is not a fault. If pleasure, etc., are also established in that way, they would become non-existent.

original: rtag pa nyid kyi ngo bor yod pa gnod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni gal te de lta na zhes bya ba'o //üîΩrtag pa yod pa med kyang mi rtag pa yod pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyi ngo bor yod pa gnod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni gal te de lta na zhes bya ba'o // rtag pa yod pa med kyang mi rtag pa yod pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ;
translated: If it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,üîΩit is taught that the remainder is possessed:üîΩIf it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,üîΩit is taught that the remainder is possessed:

original: dngos po med pa nyid du /üîΩcig car sgra sogs rgyu min phyir //
analyzed: dngos po med pa nyid du / cig car sgra sogs rgyu min phyir //
translated: If it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,üîΩit is taught that the remainder is possessed:üîΩIf it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,

original: zhes bya ba lhag ma dang ldan par bstan pa ni gal te 'di la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba lhag ma dang ldan par bstan pa ni gal te 'di la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it is taught that the remainder is possessed:üîΩIf it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,üîΩit is taught that the remainder is possessed:

original: cig car du rgyu nyid yin pa des ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa dang 'gal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig car du rgyu nyid yin pa des ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa dang 'gal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,üîΩit is taught that the remainder is possessed:

original: bsgrub bya'i chos la gnod par byed pa yang chos can la gnod pa ci'i phyir ma yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos la gnod par byed pa yang chos can la gnod pa ci'i phyir ma yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: If it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,

original: gang phyir rang nyid ces bya ba ste /üîΩ'dod pa'i chos dang nye ba yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang phyir rang nyid ces bya ba ste / 'dod pa'i chos dang nye ba yin pa'i phyir //
translated: it is taught that the remainder is possessed:üîΩIf it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,üîΩit is taught that the remainder is possessed:üîΩIf it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,üîΩit is taught that the remainder is possessed:üîΩIf it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is taught that the remainder is possessed:üîΩIf it is like that, then, because there is no contradiction in the existence of impermanence even though the existence of permanence does not exist,üîΩit is taught that the remainder is possessed:üîΩIf it is like that

original: rang nyid ces bya ba nyid kyis grub pa yin yang chos can la dngos su byed pa tha dad pa byed pa yin par bstan pa ni rang nyid sgra yis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid ces bya ba nyid kyis grub pa yin yang chos can la dngos su byed pa tha dad pa byed pa yin par bstan pa ni rang nyid sgra yis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Although the very thing called ‚Äúitself‚Äù is established, it is taught that it is a different activity that is directly applied to the subject. ‚Äú Itself‚Äù is the word.

original: chos can gzhan gyi la gnod pas gnod pa ma yin par bstan pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos can gzhan gyi la gnod pas gnod pa ma yin par bstan pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit is not taught that it is harmed by harming another subject‚Äù is supplied.

original: gal te chos can gyi skyon gyis bsgrub bya'i chos skyon yin pa'i phyir phyogs kyi skyon yin no //
analyzed: gal te chos can gyi skyon gyis bsgrub bya'i chos skyon yin pa'i phyir phyogs kyi skyon yin no //
translated: If the property of the subject is harmed because of the fault of the subject, then it is a fault of the position.

original: sgrub byed kyi skyon yang de nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi skyon yang de nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the fault of the proof is also just that,

original: de'i skyon du 'gur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i skyon du 'gur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: it is taught that it is a fault of that.

original: sgrub byed skyon ni zhes bya ba ste sgrub byed kyi sgo nas skyon rnams de'i mtshan nyid las gzhan pa'i shes par bya ba ni 'dir ma bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub byed skyon ni zhes bya ba ste sgrub byed kyi sgo nas skyon rnams de'i mtshan nyid las gzhan pa'i shes par bya ba ni 'dir ma bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe fault of the proof‚Äù means that the faults of the proof are not taught to be anything other than its definition.

original: rten ma grub pa nyid phyogs kyi skyon ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rten ma grub pa nyid phyogs kyi skyon ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit is not taught that the nonestablishment of the basis is a fault of the position‚Äù is supplied.

original: de la gnod pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la gnod pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúmerely harming that‚Äù is supplied.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis ma yin no zhes bya ba sel bar byed pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis ma yin no zhes bya ba sel bar byed pa bstan pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúNot by its own nature‚Äù is the refutation.

original: 'di nges pa yang ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nges pa yang ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis is not certain‚Äù is the explanation.

original: ma grub po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ma grub po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúNot established‚Äù is the explanation of the intended meaning of the other.

original: gzhi ma grub pas na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhi ma grub pas na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause the basis is not established‚Äù is the explanation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dam bca' ba tsam gyis zhes bya bar slob dpon gyis gsungs par bstan pa ni yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa'i skyon gang yin pa de nges te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dam bca' ba tsam gyis zhes bya bar slob dpon gyis gsungs par bstan pa ni yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa'i skyon gang yin pa de nges te /
translated: Therefore, the master says, ‚Äúmerely by the thesis,‚Äù and the explanation is that the fault that depends on the later part is certain.

original: yan lag phyi ma'i rten du 'brel to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: yan lag phyi ma'i rten du 'brel to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe connection is the basis of the later part‚Äù is the application.

original: sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa chos kyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa la gnod pa nyid ni /
analyzed: sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa chos kyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog pa la gnod pa nyid ni /
translated: ‚ÄúSound is not to be heard‚Äù and so on is the contradiction of the intrinsic nature of the property.

original: de'i khyad par dang chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par bzlog pa la gnod pa'i nye bar mtshon pa yin te de la ma 'khrul @260b pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bstan pa ni 'dis bsgrub yan lag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i khyad par dang chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par bzlog pa la gnod pa'i nye bar mtshon pa yin te de la ma 'khrul @260b pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bstan pa ni 'dis bsgrub yan lag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The particularity, the nature of the subject, and the illustration of the harm in the reversal of the particularity are taught by this, because there is no error regarding that. This is called the establishing branch.

original: bsgrub bya'i yan lag ni bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i yan lag ni bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
translated: The probandum branch is called the non-occurrence without the probandum by some.

original: bsgrub bya'i khongs su gtogs pa yin //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i khongs su gtogs pa yin //
translated: It is included within the probandum.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa mdzad pa po'i ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa mdzad pa po'i ste /
translated: This is by the author of the commentary.

original: de bstan pa ni bsgrub bya nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni bsgrub bya nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of that is because there is no distinction in being the probandum itself.

original: de'i chos can chos nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo dang 'dra ba ni phyogs tsam ste chos kyi khyad par brjod pa yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i chos can chos nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo dang 'dra ba ni phyogs tsam ste chos kyi khyad par brjod pa yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin te /
translated: The similarity of the subject and the nature of the property to be proven is merely a part of the property, but not the expression of the particular property.

original: nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is an illustration.

original: chos kyi khyad par gyi dpe bstan pa ni /
analyzed: chos kyi khyad par gyi dpe bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the example of the particular property is:

original: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid can te bya ba dang ldan pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa dang 'du ba can gyi rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid can te bya ba dang ldan pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa dang 'du ba can gyi rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The definition of substance is that which possesses action, possesses qualities, and is the cause of conjunction.

original: lci ba nyid kyi yon tan gyis dang 'og tu 'gro pa'i bya ba'i khyad par gyis 'di dag gi 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid dang ldan pa ni yan lag rnams las gzhan pa snang du rung ba yin zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: lci ba nyid kyi yon tan gyis dang 'og tu 'gro pa'i bya ba'i khyad par gyis 'di dag gi 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid dang ldan pa ni yan lag rnams las gzhan pa snang du rung ba yin zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: The cause of conjunction is that which possesses the qualities of heaviness and the particular action of moving downward, and it is perceptible as something other than the parts. This is the distinction.

original: de 'dra ba'i khyad par bral ba gzhan nyid grub kyang rgol ba la khyad cung zad kyang med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i khyad par bral ba gzhan nyid grub kyang rgol ba la khyad cung zad kyang med par bstan pa ni /
translated: Even if the establishment of otherness is free from such distinctions, there is no difference at all for the opponent. This is shown by:

original: ma mthong khyad par can min pa //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma mthong khyad par can min pa // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Not seeing, there is no distinction.

original: dgos pa ni gzhan tsam ma yin gyi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir dgos pa yin la //
analyzed: dgos pa ni gzhan tsam ma yin gyi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir dgos pa yin la //
translated: The purpose is not just otherness, but rather the desired object.

original: ma mthong ba rnams la ste rdul phra rab 'bras bu mi rtsom pa rnams la 'bras bu med par mthong nas /
analyzed: ma mthong ba rnams la ste rdul phra rab 'bras bu mi rtsom pa rnams la 'bras bu med par mthong nas /
translated: For those who do not see, i.e., for subtle atoms that do not produce effects, seeing that there are no effects,

original: mthong ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa rtag tu nus pa dang ldan pa des na bsgrub bya nyid yin no zhes bstan pa ni yan lag can 'dod do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa rtag tu nus pa dang ldan pa des na bsgrub bya nyid yin no zhes bstan pa ni yan lag can 'dod do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since it is always endowed with the capacity to see, grasp, etc., it is the probandum. This is indicated by the words ‚Äúthe opponent accepts the whole.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyi ba tsam ni phyir rgol ba yang 'dod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ba tsam ni phyir rgol ba yang 'dod pa kho na yin te /
translated: The mere ‚Äúotherness‚Äù is accepted by the opponent.

original: bde ba la sogs pa kun rdzob pa yin par bstan pa ni khyad par can min zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa kun rdzob pa yin par bstan pa ni khyad par can min zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that pleasure, etc., are conventional is indicated by the words ‚Äúnot distinctive.‚Äù

original: bsgrub bya'i chos khyad par bstan nas de'i gnod pa la sbyor ba ni gal te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos khyad par bstan nas de'i gnod pa la sbyor ba ni gal te /
translated: Having taught the distinctive probandum, the opponent‚Äôs position is undermined:

original: 'di lci 'og 'gro 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'du ba can gyi rgyu yan lag can ni yan lag rnams las gzhan zhes bya bar dam bca' ba la yan lag can ni yan lag las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di lci 'og 'gro 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'du ba can gyi rgyu yan lag can ni yan lag rnams las gzhan zhes bya bar dam bca' ba la yan lag can ni yan lag las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: If the whole is endowed with the action of ‚Äúweighing down,‚Äù the qualities of ‚Äúhaving parts‚Äù and ‚Äúbeing a cause of aggregation,‚Äù then the whole is different from the parts. This is the thesis. The whole is not different from the parts,

original: srang mda' ba'i khyad par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: srang mda' ba'i khyad par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because the difference between the parts and the whole is not apprehended, just as the difference between the parts of a scale is not apprehended.

original: gzhan nyid yin na yan lag bzhin du 'di yang lci ba nyid lhag pa de'i yon tan gyi 'bras bu dang / de'i 'bras bu dma' ba yang khyad par du mi 'gyur zhing mtho ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin na yan lag bzhin du 'di yang lci ba nyid lhag pa de'i yon tan gyi 'bras bu dang / de'i 'bras bu dma' ba yang khyad par du mi 'gyur zhing mtho ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If it were different, then like the parts, it would be the effect of the qualities of heaviness, etc., and the effect of those would not be distinguished as low or not low.

original: chos gzhan nyid kyi khyad par las bzlog pas gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: chos gzhan nyid kyi khyad par las bzlog pas gnod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the existence of the whole is refuted by the fact that it is different from the qualities.

original: yan lag can ni yan @261a * //
analyzed: yan lag can ni yan @261a * //
translated: The whole is not different from the parts.

original: lag dag las gzhan ma yin te zhes bya bas chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: lag dag las gzhan ma yin te zhes bya bas chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo bsal ba yin te /
translated: This refutes the intrinsic reality of the subject.

original: mngon sum gyi yan lag can las gzhan nyid yin na yan lag rnams mngon sum pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi yan lag can las gzhan nyid yin na yan lag rnams mngon sum pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the whole were different from the parts, then the parts would not be manifest.

original: rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te //
translated: Substance does not exist.

original: zhes bya ba ni yod na tha dad par 'gyur la de lta na yang khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yod na tha dad par 'gyur la de lta na yang khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it existed, it would be different, and in that case, there would be no difference.

original: chos can gyi khyad par gsal ba ni yan lag can ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos can gyi khyad par gsal ba ni yan lag can ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The clarification of the distinction of the subject is ‚Äúthe whole.‚Äù

original: de bshad pa ni gang zhig gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni gang zhig gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of that is ‚Äúthat which is in this.‚Äù

original: yan lag dag gzhan ma yin pa zhes bya ba bshad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yan lag dag gzhan ma yin pa zhes bya ba bshad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the phrase ‚Äúthe parts are not different‚Äù is ‚Äúif‚Äù .

original: de yan lag can zhes bya ba ni yan lag can tha dad pa'i phyogs la srang mda' dma' ba'i khyad par gnyi ga'i mngon sum nyid du khyad par med pa'i khyab byed rnams la med pas gnod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don nam yan lag can gzhan
analyzed: de yan lag can zhes bya ba ni yan lag can tha dad pa'i phyogs la srang mda' dma' ba'i khyad par gnyi ga'i mngon sum nyid du khyad par med pa'i khyab byed rnams la med pas gnod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don nam yan lag can gzhan
translated: ‚ÄúThat is the possessor of parts‚Äù means that in the system of the difference of the possessor of parts and the parts, the parts are not different from the possessor of parts, and the parts are not different from each other. The parts are not different from the possessor of parts, and the parts are not different from each other. The two, the difference of the low and high points of the scale, are pervaded by the absence of difference in direct perception. Therefore, the example is invalidated.

original: ma yin pa dang yan lag dag gzhan ma yin yang gnyi ga gcig tu byas nas chos kyi khyad par sems par byed pas so //
analyzed: ma yin pa dang yan lag dag gzhan ma yin yang gnyi ga gcig tu byas nas chos kyi khyad par sems par byed pas so //
translated: The meaning is that the parts are not different from the possessor of parts, and the parts are not different from each other. But both are made into one, and a specific quality is imagined.

original: rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te //
translated: ‚ÄúThe substance does not exist‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo sel bas so zhes bya ba dpe gnyis ni smra ba po tshad ma nyid du khas blangs pas des byas pa'i ngag nyid bde bar brjod par bya ba nyid las bzlog pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa
analyzed: zhes bya ba chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo sel bas so zhes bya ba dpe gnyis ni smra ba po tshad ma nyid du khas blangs pas des byas pa'i ngag nyid bde bar brjod par bya ba nyid las bzlog pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa
translated: means that the intrinsic reality of the subject is eliminated. The two examples are stated by the proponent, who is accepted as an authority. Therefore, the statement made by him is shown to be contradictory to the opposite of the fact that it is to be stated comfortably.

original: ni dag thams cad kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ni dag thams cad kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù means all.

original: bstan to zhes bya bas yan lag can gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba sun 'byin pa'i yul gyi dam bca' ba'i don yin par bstan to //
analyzed: bstan to zhes bya bas yan lag can gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba sun 'byin pa'i yul gyi dam bca' ba'i don yin par bstan to //
translated: The phrase is taught indicates the meaning of the thesis of the opponent's refutation, namely, that there is no other possessor of the parts.

original: blo 'khrul pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ji ltar yin zhe na rdul phra rab rnams nyid kyi rnam par dbye ba rkyang pa las dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ha cang ring po na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: blo 'khrul pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ji ltar yin zhe na rdul phra rab rnams nyid kyi rnam par dbye ba rkyang pa las dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ha cang ring po na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: How is it that the aspect of the deluded cognition is as it is? It is taught that because the atoms themselves are perceived as a mere collection, that is, because the atoms themselves are perceived as a mere collection, not as a whole.

original: nye ba'i skra shad snang ba nyid bzhin du thag ring ba la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nye ba'i skra shad snang ba nyid bzhin du thag ring ba la ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not like the appearance of nearby floating hairs, which are not seen from a distance.

original: rdul phra rab nyid du khyad par med la snang ba dang mi snang ba dag tu rung ba nyid la khyad par med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdul phra rab nyid du khyad par med la snang ba dang mi snang ba dag tu rung ba nyid la khyad par med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no difference in the atoms themselves, but there is a difference in whether or not they are suitable to appear.

original: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir dang chen po nyid kyi phyir dang / rdzas du ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir dang / ngo bo'i khyad par dang 'du ba yin pa'i phyir rdzas dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni de phyir 'bras bu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir dang chen po nyid kyi phyir dang / rdzas du ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir dang / ngo bo'i khyad par dang 'du ba yin pa'i phyir rdzas dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni de phyir 'bras bu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is devoid of the characteristics of substance, because it is great, because it possesses many substances, and because it is a particular nature and a combination, substance is not perceived.

original: 'bras bu ni lci ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni lci ba nyid do //
translated: Weight is the effect.

original: bya ba ni bsgribs pa la sogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni bsgribs pa la sogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi'o //

original: ngo bo ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ngo bo ni rang bzhin no //

analyzed: yon tan dang bya ba dang 'bras bu bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of quality, action, and effect is

analyzed: rags pa'i shugs kyis rdul phra rab grub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The appearance of a single mass is not a real object.üîΩThe appearance

original: 'di nyid rgyas par snang bas rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid rgyas par snang bas rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because this is extensive, it is the nature of the atom.

original: zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni //
translated: The meaning of this is taught:

original: gal te ci nyid mi rtogs na //
analyzed: gal te ci nyid mi rtogs na //
translated: If one does not understand what it is,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: this is what is said.

original: de rig pa ni yan lag can nyid rig pa'o //
analyzed: de rig pa ni yan lag can nyid rig pa'o //

analyzed: 'di nyid la zhes bya ba ni lci ba nyid la sogs pa rig pa nyid la re ba yin no //

original: gzhan du na yan lag rnams kyis yan lag can de ji ltar byas pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du na yan lag rnams kyis yan lag can de ji ltar byas pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
