original: de'i zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: The word his refers to the other.

original: so sor zhes bya ba ni gong bu gnyis la sogs pa'i rim gyis so //
analyzed: so sor zhes bya ba ni gong bu gnyis la sogs pa'i rim gyis so //
translated: Individually means by the process of the aggregate, etc.

original: gong bu gnyis la sogs pa'i rim pas gong bu lnga cig car sbyar bas gong bu lnga po rnams kyi nang gi yan lag rnams med na so sor bcal ba ni rim gyi sbyor ba dang / cig car sbyar ba ni lhan cig pa yin pa'i 'du ba can rgyu yin pa'i phyir mtha' yan lag can gyi dus na yan lag can thams cad zhig par 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gong bu gnyis la sogs pa'i rim pas gong bu lnga cig car sbyar bas gong bu lnga po rnams kyi nang gi yan lag rnams med na so sor bcal ba ni rim gyi sbyor ba dang / cig car sbyar ba ni lhan cig pa yin pa'i 'du ba can rgyu yin pa'i phyir mtha' yan lag can gyi dus na yan lag can thams cad zhig par 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Since the cause is the possessor of conjunction, it is not asserted that at the time of the final possessor of parts, all possessors of parts are destroyed,

original: phra rab kyi bar du rdzas kyi phreng par khas len pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phra rab kyi bar du rdzas kyi phreng par khas len pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is accepted that the series of substances extends down to the subtle particles.

original: lhan cig dang rim gyis sbyar ba'i rdul gyi phung po ni rdzas rtsom pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig dang rim gyis sbyar ba'i rdul gyi phung po ni rdzas rtsom pa ma yin no //
translated: If that were so, the mass of particles joined gradually and simultaneously would not be the composition of substances.

original: de lta bu'i phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na rim gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na rim gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because there is no such contact.üîΩThe subtle particles are also destroyed.

original: rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'jig pas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'jig pas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is not the assertion of others.

original: rdul phra rab med do zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi ste spyod pa pa rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: rdul phra rab med do zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi ste spyod pa pa rnams kyi ste /
translated: The assertion that there are no partless particles is that of some, namely, the Carvakas.

original: rdul phra rab rnams gdon mi za bas 'dod pa ma yin no zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams gdon mi za bas 'dod pa ma yin no zhes bya bas so //
translated: The Carvakas do not accept the existence of partless particles.

original: gcig gi ngo bo gzhan la yod pa ma yin te gzhan du rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig gi ngo bo gzhan la yod pa ma yin te gzhan du rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of one does not exist in another, because they are cognized as different.

original: de'i phyir rdul @262a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdul @262a * //
translated: Therefore, the nature of a dyad of particles,

original: phra rab gnyis can gyi yang ngo bo gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga'i thun mong bar nyams su myong ba med pa'o //
analyzed: phra rab gnyis can gyi yang ngo bo gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga'i thun mong bar nyams su myong ba med pa'o //
translated: which is not experienced in common by both, does not exist.

original: nam phyed la sogs pa'i rim gyis gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi'i grangs la sogs pa lhan cig bzhus pa ni shin tu phrad pa yin pa'i phyir rdzas su rtsom pa ni lci ba la sogs pa tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nam phyed la sogs pa'i rim gyis gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi'i grangs la sogs pa lhan cig bzhus pa ni shin tu phrad pa yin pa'i phyir rdzas su rtsom pa ni lci ba la sogs pa tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The number of two, three, four, etc., in the process of midnight, etc., is not very clear, because they are mixed together. The composition of substance, i.e., heaviness, etc., is different.

original: grangs mtshungs pa ni 'dres pa'i dus na snga ma dang so so bar gyur pas so //
analyzed: grangs mtshungs pa ni 'dres pa'i dus na snga ma dang so so bar gyur pas so //
translated: The number is the same, because it is the same as before, when they are mixed together.

original: ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhag pa bzhin du nye bar mtshon par bya ba nyid ma yin pa ni mngon sum gyis gnod pa yin te /
analyzed: ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhag pa bzhin du nye bar mtshon par bya ba nyid ma yin pa ni mngon sum gyis gnod pa yin te /
translated: It is contradicted by perception, because it is not the case that the collection is not represented by the representation of one part, like a piece of cotton placed over a wound.

original: tshogs pa la de nye bar mtshon pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gcig ces bya ba ste 'da' ba zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa la de nye bar mtshon pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gcig ces bya ba ste 'da' ba zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: The reply to this is given in the line, ‚ÄúOne part is not the whole.‚Äù

original: gcig bzhin du yan lag can gyi lci ba la sogs pa thams cad nye bar mtshon pa ma yin na mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir rdul phra rab rnams kyi lci ba nyid tsam lus pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig bzhin du yan lag can gyi lci ba la sogs pa thams cad nye bar mtshon pa ma yin na mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir rdul phra rab rnams kyi lci ba nyid tsam lus pa yin no //
translated: If one part is not represented by the representation of the whole, then, since the situation is the same for all wholes, such as a heavy blanket, only the mere heaviness of the atoms remains.

original: de lta na yang rdul de'i tshogs nyid rdzas yin gyi gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni gal te yungs kar nas brtsams te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang rdul de'i tshogs nyid rdzas yin gyi gzhan ma yin par bstan pa ni gal te yungs kar nas brtsams te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But even so, the collection of atoms is a substance, not something else. The reply to this is given in the line, ‚ÄúIf you begin with mustard seeds.

original: yungs kar nas brtsams nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yungs kar nas brtsams nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Starting from mustard seed meansüîΩ.

original: gnyis pa can nas brtsams nas rdul phra rab lci ba nyid kho na mtha'i yan lag can gyi gnas skabs la yang gzhal bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i rig pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gnyis pa can nas brtsams nas rdul phra rab lci ba nyid kho na mtha'i yan lag can gyi gnas skabs la yang gzhal bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i rig pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration of the reasoning that begins with two atoms and continues up to the time of the ultimate component, the atom of weight, is the object of measurement:

original: tha ma'i zhes bya ba ste rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur ba'i yan lag can dag zhig na yang de nyid de dag gi lci ba nyid du mthong ngo //
analyzed: tha ma'i zhes bya ba ste rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur ba'i yan lag can dag zhig na yang de nyid de dag gi lci ba nyid du mthong ngo //
translated: Even when the components, which are cause and effect, are destroyed, weight is seen in them.

original: yang na tha ma ste mtha'i yan lag can zhig kyang lci ba nyid gang yin pa rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa de dag gi de nyid mthong ba'o //
analyzed: yang na tha ma ste mtha'i yan lag can zhig kyang lci ba nyid gang yin pa rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa de dag gi de nyid mthong ba'o //
translated: Or, even when the ultimate component is destroyed, weight is seen in them, which are cause and effect.

original: phyis kyang zhes bya ba ni yan lag can zhig pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: phyis kyang zhes bya ba ni yan lag can zhig pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Also later, when the components are destroyed,

original: de zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The effect is called ‚Äúthat.‚Äù

original: lci ba nyid nye bar ma mtshon kyang gzhal bar bya ba'i 'da' ba bzhin du rdzas ni yan lag 'dus pa las gzhan par mthong ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: lci ba nyid nye bar ma mtshon kyang gzhal bar bya ba'i 'da' ba bzhin du rdzas ni yan lag 'dus pa las gzhan par mthong ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though weight is not illustrated, substance is not seen as different from the collection of components, just as the object of measurement is not seen as different from the past. The demonstration of this is:

original: don de mthong med ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: don de mthong med ces bya ba ste /
translated: The meaning of the verse is this:

original: thag ring ba dang nye ba dang nye ba la yang yan lag 'dus pa gcig po shes pa la snang ba yin te /
analyzed: thag ring ba dang nye ba dang nye ba la yang yan lag 'dus pa gcig po shes pa la snang ba yin te /
translated: The cognition of the whole, which is the collection of parts, does not appear as something different from the parts, whether distant or near.

original: de'i byed pa la tha mi dad pa'i gcig yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i byed pa la tha mi dad pa'i gcig yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the whole is not different from the activity of the parts.

original: de'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni yan lag 'dus pa la byung ba'i bsgribs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni yan lag 'dus pa la byung ba'i bsgribs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The effect of the whole is the arising of the whole from the collection of parts, such as the arising of the cloth from the collection of threads.üîΩThe whole is not the same as the parts, such as the threads, because the whole is not perceived when the parts are perceived.üîΩThe whole is not different from the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the parts.

original: yan lag gi gzugs la sogs pa las yan lag can gyi gzugs la sogs pa de dang ldan pa yin gyi yan lag can lci ba nyid du @262b nye bar ma mtshon kyang snang ba kho na ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /üîΩlci ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: yan lag gi gzugs la sogs pa las yan lag can gyi gzugs la sogs pa de dang ldan pa yin gyi yan lag can lci ba nyid du @262b nye bar ma mtshon kyang snang ba kho na ma yin nam zhes zer ba la / lci ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The whole is not dependent on the parts, because the whole is not perceived when the parts are not perceived.üîΩThe whole is not independent of the parts, because the whole is not perceived when the parts are not assembled.üîΩThe whole is not the mere collection of the parts, because the collection of parts is not the whole.üîΩThe whole is not the arrangement of the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the arrangement of the parts.üîΩThe whole is not the possession of the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the parts.üîΩThe whole is not the support of the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the parts.üîΩThe whole is not the supported by the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the parts.üîΩThe whole is not the possessor of the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the parts.üîΩThe whole is not the collection of the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the collection of the parts.üîΩThe whole is not the arrangement of the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the arrangement of the parts.

original: thams cad kyang de yin la de'i yon tan yang yin pa de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyang de yin la de'i yon tan yang yin pa de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The whole is not the possession of the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the parts.üîΩThe whole is not the support of the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the parts.

original: nam phyed la sogs pa'i yan lag can ni yan lag rnams las lhag pa ma yin te //
analyzed: nam phyed la sogs pa'i yan lag can ni yan lag rnams las lhag pa ma yin te //
translated: The whole is not the supported by the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the parts.üîΩThe whole is not the possessor of the parts, because the whole is not perceived as something different from the parts.

original: srang mda' dma' ba'i khyad par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de'i 'bras bu thams cad yon tan la sogs pa lhag pa med pa nye bar mtshon pa'i don du'o zhes bstan pa ni dma' ba'i min zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: srang mda' dma' ba'i khyad par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de'i 'bras bu thams cad yon tan la sogs pa lhag pa med pa nye bar mtshon pa'i don du'o zhes bstan pa ni dma' ba'i min zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of because it does not apprehend the difference of the low balance-arm is that it is taught to illustrate the absence of any superiority in all its qualities, etc.

original: de'i yon tan thams cad med pa ci las yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: de'i yon tan thams cad med pa ci las yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: What is the reason for the absence of all its qualities?

original: ji bzhin rang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji bzhin rang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as its own is stated.

original: ma rtogs pa ni ma dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni ma dmigs pa'o //
translated: Non-apprehension is non-observation.

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni yan lag rnams las yan lag can gzhan yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni yan lag rnams las yan lag can gzhan yin pa'o //
translated: This also refers to the possessor being different from the parts.

original: chos kyi khyad par bsal ba bzhin du chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par bsal ba yang ji ltar yod pa khas len pa dang / rang gi tshig la sogs pas gnod par brjod par bya ba yin par bstan pa ni khas blangs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi khyad par bsal ba bzhin du chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par bsal ba yang ji ltar yod pa khas len pa dang / rang gi tshig la sogs pas gnod par brjod par bya ba yin par bstan pa ni khas blangs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as the distinction of the property is stated, the own-nature and distinction of the property-possessor are also stated to be accepted as existent, and to be refuted by one's own words, etc. This is taught by acceptance.

original: phyogs kyis ni zhes bya bas ni chos kyi khyad par sel bar byed pa'i phyogs kyis so //
analyzed: phyogs kyis ni zhes bya bas ni chos kyi khyad par sel bar byed pa'i phyogs kyis so //
translated: By direction is meant the direction that excludes the particular of the property.

original: ngo bo la gnod pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par la sogs pa la gnod pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: ngo bo la gnod pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par la sogs pa la gnod pa bzhin du'o //
translated: Just as in the case of harm to the essence, etc. means just as in the case of harm to the particular of one's own essence, etc.

original: bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pa ni bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa yin pa bzhin du bsgrub bya yin zhes bya ba ni grub par bsal ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pa ni bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa yin pa bzhin du bsgrub bya yin zhes bya ba ni grub par bsal ba'i don to //
translated: The word established is used in the sense of excluded from the non-established, as in it is established because it is not different from the probandum.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs la sogs pa ma grub pa'i tshig dam bca' ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs la sogs pa ma grub pa'i tshig dam bca' ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, the words of an unestablished reason, etc. are a thesis.

original: 'dod pa'i khyad par med na'o zhes bstan pa ni bya ba dus gsum zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khyad par med na'o zhes bstan pa ni bya ba dus gsum zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of if there is no difference in what is desired is the action in the three times.

original: da ltar ba kho nar ci'i phyir mi brjod ces bya ba la 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: da ltar ba kho nar ci'i phyir mi brjod ces bya ba la 'grel pa ni /
translated: Why is it not stated as only in the present? The commentary says:

original: de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed kyi bdag nyid ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin zhes bya ba ni sgrub byed kyi bdag nyid ma yin pa'o //
translated: Not having such a nature means not having the nature of the probandum.

original: rtag pa lus can ma yin pa'i phyir blo bzhin du dang / mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtag pa lus can ma yin pa'i phyir blo bzhin du dang / mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni /
translated: Because the permanent is not embodied, like the intellect, and because it is apprehended by the eye, it is taught to be just like that.

original: nye bar dgod pa ste de de'i tshe mi 'dod na yang bsgrub byar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: nye bar dgod pa ste de de'i tshe mi 'dod na yang bsgrub byar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The statement ‚Äúeven if not accepted at that time, it becomes the probandum‚Äù is to be supplied.

original: go bar byed ba'i dbang du byas pa ni ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: go bar byed ba'i dbang du byas pa ni ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: With regard to the means of understanding, it is not that the refutation of unestablished reasons, etc.

original: byed pa po la ltos pas bsgrub bya bsal bar bya ba'i ched du yin no zhes bstan pa ni shes par byed pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: byed pa po la ltos pas bsgrub bya bsal bar bya ba'i ched du yin no zhes bstan pa ni shes par byed pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is for the purpose of refuting the probandum, since it depends on the agent. The statement ‚Äúthe means of understanding‚Äù teaches this.

original: la brten min zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa las gzhan pa'o//
analyzed: la brten min zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa las gzhan pa'o//
translated: ‚ÄúNot based on that‚Äù means other than unestablished reasons, etc.

original: @263a * // gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni shes par byed pa'i gnas skabs ma yin na'o //
analyzed: @263a * // gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni shes par byed pa'i gnas skabs ma yin na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means not in the context of the means of understanding.

original: 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba'o 'dod pa'i rkyen bzhin du las la sogs pa mi 'dod pa rnam par gcod pa yin par bstan pa ni thams cad ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba'o 'dod pa'i rkyen bzhin du las la sogs pa mi 'dod pa rnam par gcod pa yin par bstan pa ni thams cad ces bya ba ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the desire realm‚Äù excludes such things as karma, which are not desired.

original: shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag gi chos can la sgrub byed kho na ngag gis bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi sgrub par byed pa cig shos nyid kyis 'dod pa grub ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag gi chos can la sgrub byed kho na ngag gis bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi sgrub par byed pa cig shos nyid kyis 'dod pa grub ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúall of them‚Äù indicates that the subject, which is the specific property possessor that is desired to be known, is established by the statement that is the proof. The meaning is that the other party, who is the one who posits the proof, does not establish what is desired.

original: bsgrub bya'i ngo bo brjod pa nyid kyis grub pa'i ngo bo bkag pa yin no zhes bya ba yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i ngo bo brjod pa nyid kyis grub pa'i ngo bo bkag pa yin no zhes bya ba yang mi rigs te /
translated: It is also illogical to say that the statement of the nature of the probandum refutes the nature of the proof.

original: mtshan nyid las sngar yod pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: mtshan nyid las sngar yod pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la /
translated: This is because the existence of something prior to its characteristics is not established.

original: sngar ma grub pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar ma grub pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúprior to its nonestablishment‚Äù means prior to its nonestablishment.

original: de la ma rtogs pa ni mtshan nyid la ma rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la ma rtogs pa ni mtshan nyid la ma rtogs pa'o //
translated: In that case, nonunderstanding is nonunderstanding of the characteristics.

original: bsgrub pa'i yul nyid kyang ma grub pa tsam las byung ba dang / de bzhin du de la 'ong ba nyid dang de ltar 'dod pa nyid dang / de'i phug nyid brjod par 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i yul nyid kyang ma grub pa tsam las byung ba dang / de bzhin du de la 'ong ba nyid dang de ltar 'dod pa nyid dang / de'i phug nyid brjod par 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: The object of proof is not established merely by that, and similarly, it is not the mere coming of that, nor the mere desire for that, nor the mere desire to express that.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las khyad par med kyang de ltar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las khyad par med kyang de ltar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase in particular means that even though it is not different from the world, it is expressed in that way.

original: mdo'i rnam par dbye ba ni byed pa por 'dod pa dang 'dod phug kyang yin pa la 'dod pa snga ma la ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i don med do //
analyzed: mdo'i rnam par dbye ba ni byed pa por 'dod pa dang 'dod phug kyang yin pa la 'dod pa snga ma la ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i don med do //
translated: The analysis of the s≈´tra is that the object of desire is also the object of desire for the agent, but in the former case, there is no special meaning.

original: spong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni byed pa po rnams kyi bya ba la khyad par 'phags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni byed pa po rnams kyi bya ba la khyad par 'phags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the abandonment, the action of the agents is not special.

original: chos bsgrub bya ba na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos bsgrub bya ba na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When establishing the dharma, it is said the object of desire is the object of desire for the agent.

original: don med 'gyur zhes bya ba ni chos can grub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: don med 'gyur zhes bya ba ni chos can grub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: It would be meaningless means that because the subject is established, the reason is not a proof of what is to be established.

original: phyi ma'i yan lag la ltos nas tha dad par grub pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi 'gal ba yang yin par bstan pa ni tshogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi ma'i yan lag la ltos nas tha dad par grub pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi 'gal ba yang yin par bstan pa ni tshogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù shows that the parts are not only established as different in dependence on each other, but also that they are contradictory.

original: phan tshun zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa la'o //
analyzed: phan tshun zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa la'o //
translated: ‚Äú Mutually‚Äù refers to the collection.

original: ngag gi dbye bas dpe la chos can dang gtan tshigs la chos so //
analyzed: ngag gi dbye bas dpe la chos can dang gtan tshigs la chos so //
translated: The example is divided into the subject and the predicate.

original: nye bar btags nas bsgrub bya yin par bstan pa ni mi srid phyir na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar btags nas bsgrub bya yin par bstan pa ni mi srid phyir na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The conclusion is stated by the phrase ‚Äúbecause it is impossible.‚Äù

original: tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid med na rang nyid kyis ngan par byas pa spangs pas rtogs pa nyid kho na ci'i phyir ma yin zhes bstan pa ni bstan bcos ci bya zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid med na rang nyid kyis ngan par byas pa spangs pas rtogs pa nyid kho na ci'i phyir ma yin zhes bstan pa ni bstan bcos ci bya zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The question ‚ÄúWhat is the point of the treatise?‚Äù shows that if the collection did not have its own characteristics, then the parts would be abandoned by their own faults, and so the collection would not exist.

original: bstan bcos byed pa nyid ni nye bar btags pa smra ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa nyid ni nye bar btags pa smra ba ma yin te /
translated: The author of the treatise is not a sophist.

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang / btags pa pa ma yin pa yod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang / btags pa pa ma yin pa yod pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because there is no need for it, and because the non-nominal exists.

original: de ltar rtogs par gyis zhes bya ba yang thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par gyis zhes bya ba yang thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of it is too much to say that one should understand it in that way is that it is too much to say that one should understand it in that way.üîΩThe word only is to be supplied. The meaning of because the universal is figuratively designated in the part is that the universal is figuratively designated in the part that is the basis of the universal.

original: yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshogs @263b pa'i chos can gyi phyogs yin no zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i nye bar btags te /
analyzed: yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshogs @263b pa'i chos can gyi phyogs yin no zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i nye bar btags te /
translated: The word only is to be supplied. The meaning of because the universal is figuratively designated in the part is that the universal is figuratively designated in the part that is the basis of the universal.

original: ras yug chen 'thag go zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: ras yug chen 'thag go zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, He weaves a large cloth.

original: de'i cha zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni de'i chos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i cha zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni de'i chos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation a part of it means a property of it.

original: chos can ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: chos can ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not the property-possessor?

original: smra ba po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: smra ba po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, because of the power of the speaker's intention.

original: smra ba po'i sgra 'am brda byed pa po'i 'das pa'i rgan po rnams kyi yin gyi da ltar ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: smra ba po'i sgra 'am brda byed pa po'i 'das pa'i rgan po rnams kyi yin gyi da ltar ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is the property of the former elders who are the speakers or the ones who make the signs, not of the present ones, because of their power.

original: de'i nus pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i nus pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of because of the power of the speaker's intention.

original: de lta na ci zhig bzlog par bya ba yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: de lta na ci zhig bzlog par bya ba yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: What is to be refuted in that case?

original: de'i phyogs gcig ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: He says, one part of it.

original: phyogs gcig ni sgra'i nus pa'i nges pas chos can yin no //
analyzed: phyogs gcig ni sgra'i nus pa'i nges pas chos can yin no //
translated: One part is the subject by the force of the words.

original: ci las she na phyogs kyi sgra spyi brjod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ci las she na phyogs kyi sgra spyi brjod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Why? Because the word ‚Äúpart‚Äù does not express a universal.

original: chos can gyi khyad par tsam brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can gyi khyad par tsam brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it expresses only the particular of the subject.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa ni phyogs kyi sgras ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa ni phyogs kyi sgras ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is explained: The word ‚Äúpart‚Äù does not express a universal.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni 'dir shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni 'dir shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that in order to show that the subject here is what is to be inferred, which has the particular that is desired to be known.

original: sngar nges par gzung bar 'gyur ram zhes bya ba ni sngar bsgrub pa rjes su brjod pa'o //
analyzed: sngar nges par gzung bar 'gyur ram zhes bya ba ni sngar bsgrub pa rjes su brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWould it be apprehended earlier?‚Äù means that the proof would be stated earlier.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gzhan yin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gzhan yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means something else.

original: de lta na gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta na gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case, it would not be something else.‚Äù

original: gzhan dgag pa yin la gzhan nges par gzung ba de'i sgrub pa ni de las gzhan pa bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dgag pa yin la gzhan nges par gzung ba de'i sgrub pa ni de las gzhan pa bsdu ba'o //
translated: The negation of something else is the affirmation of something else, which includes what is other than that.

original: de ni 'di'i nges par gzung ba ma yin gyi de'i tshig la yin no zhes zer ba ni /üîΩgal te bsgrub par bya ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di'i nges par gzung ba ma yin gyi de'i tshig la yin no zhes zer ba ni / gal te bsgrub par bya ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: That is not the ascertainment of this, but of that word.üîΩIf it is said that the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the sake of eliminating the object of refutation, then it is said that the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the sake of eliminating the object of refutation.

original: 'phangs pa nyid kyis yin par bstan pa ni sgrub byed bstan pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'phangs pa nyid kyis yin par bstan pa ni sgrub byed bstan pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is indicated by the implication is ‚Äúthe statement of the proof.‚Äù

original: don de zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: don de zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'o //
translated: The meaning of that is not established.

original: med pa gtso bo'i bsgrub bya'i tshig bsgrub pa la yang bstan pa ni gtan tshigs sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med pa gtso bo'i bsgrub bya'i tshig bsgrub pa la yang bstan pa ni gtan tshigs sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the word of the probandum is established in the absence of the chief is ‚Äúthe reason, etc.‚Äù

original: 'di'i 'bras bu ni gtan tshigs pa la sogs par dam 'cha' ba ste /
analyzed: 'di'i 'bras bu ni gtan tshigs pa la sogs par dam 'cha' ba ste /
translated: The result of this is the promise of the reason, etc.

original: 'di yang gtan tshigs kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid kho na la nyid ces bya ba'i yi ge las khyab pa grub pa ni 'gal ba yin pas grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di yang gtan tshigs kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid kho na la nyid ces bya ba'i yi ge las khyab pa grub pa ni 'gal ba yin pas grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is also the definition of the example of the reason. The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the sake of establishing the pervasion. It is established by the word ‚Äúonly.‚Äù

original: der zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa bsgrub pa'i sgrub byed la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa bsgrub pa'i sgrub byed la sogs pa ste /
translated: There, in the proof of the unestablished, the reason, etc.,

original: grub pa bzhin du sgrub par byed pa don med pa yin te /
analyzed: grub pa bzhin du sgrub par byed pa don med pa yin te /
translated: like the established, the proof is purposeless.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i nyid kho nas zhes bya ba'i sgra'i byed pa nyid las sgrub byed du brjod pa sel ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i nyid kho nas zhes bya ba'i sgra'i byed pa nyid las sgrub byed du brjod pa sel ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in ‚Äúestablishes only‚Äù eliminates the idea that the reason is the proof.

original: sngar nges bzung bas zhes bya ba bsgrub bya bstan pa nyid ces bya ba ni bshad pa'o //üîΩgang @264a * //
analyzed: sngar nges bzung bas zhes bya ba bsgrub bya bstan pa nyid ces bya ba ni bshad pa'o // gang @264a * //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause of the previous ascertainment‚Äù means that the thesis is taught.üîΩThe word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is a reason.

original: gi phyir don med pa de'i phyir khyab pa 'bras bu can dam bca' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs pa sdud par byed pa ni shugs kyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gi phyir don med pa de'i phyir khyab pa 'bras bu can dam bca' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs pa sdud par byed pa ni shugs kyis gnas pa'o //
translated: Since the thesis is meaningless, the inclusion of the unestablished reason, etc., is implied by the fact that the pervasion is the result of the thesis.

original: sgrub par byed pa dogs pa'ang med //üîΩces bya ba dang / de lta na'ang dpe ni ma grub par //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dogs pa'ang med // ces bya ba dang / de lta na'ang dpe ni ma grub par //
translated: There is no doubt about the proof.

original: zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni /
translated: And is it not contradictory to say that even though this is so, the example is not established?

original: gal te rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúif‚Äù means ‚Äúif you yourself.‚Äù

original: des na zhes bya ba ni sngar nges par bzung ba la don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni sngar nges par bzung ba la don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äútherefore‚Äù means ‚Äúbecause of the previous ascertainment, which is meaningless.‚Äù

original: bsal ba zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: bsal ba zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The word ‚Äúeliminates‚Äù means

original: de lta'ang dpe ni ma grub la //
analyzed: de lta'ang dpe ni ma grub la //
translated: But the example is not established.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the statement.

original: 'gal ba nyid ni sgrub byed do //
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid ni sgrub byed do //
translated: The contradiction is the proof.

original: 'dod pa dang 'brel pa med pa ni bsgrub bya dang ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang 'brel pa med pa ni bsgrub bya dang ngo //
translated: The absence of connection with the thesis is the probandum.

original: phan med ni 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: phan med ni 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: The uselessness is the contradiction.

original: lhan cig gnas pa min zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig gnas pa min zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'o //
translated: The non-coexistence is the unestablished.

original: ci ste zhes bya ba ni thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya ba ni thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyis so //
translated: If it is said that everything is impermanent,

original: sgra la zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i chos can nyid la mi rtag pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs dang bcas pa yin na /üîΩde ltar de thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes rjod par byed na mthun pa'i phyogs nyid du 'gal bas sel bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
analyzed: sgra la zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i chos can nyid la mi rtag pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs dang bcas pa yin na / de ltar de thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes rjod par byed na mthun pa'i phyogs nyid du 'gal bas sel bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
translated: sound is said to have the property of the probandum, and if impermanence is the reason,üîΩif it is said in this way that everything is impermanent, then because it contradicts being the similar class, it is not an exclusion, so say some.

original: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya bas de ni de ltar bzlog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya bas de ni de ltar bzlog par 'gyur te /
translated: By saying that everything is impermanent, that is reversed in this way.

original: gal te sgra nyid mi rtag pa nyid yin pa des ni gtan tshigs dang ldan pa nyid du rjod par byed na zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o ;
analyzed: gal te sgra nyid mi rtag pa nyid yin pa des ni gtan tshigs dang ldan pa nyid du rjod par byed na zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o ;
translated: If sound itself is impermanent, then it is said to possess a reason, this is the position of the Jains.

original: / gal te mi rtag pa nyid dang / de'i gtan tshigs nyid kyang sgrar mi brjod na ci zhig rjod par byed ces zer ba la 'di la dpe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: / gal te mi rtag pa nyid dang / de'i gtan tshigs nyid kyang sgrar mi brjod na ci zhig rjod par byed ces zer ba la 'di la dpe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If impermanence and its reason are not expressed by the word sound, then what is expressed? This is the example.

original: dpe bstan pa yang mthun pa'i phyogs nyid kyis bstan pa ni khyad par las ni gzhan brjod nas zhes bya ba ste gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
analyzed: dpe bstan pa yang mthun pa'i phyogs nyid kyis bstan pa ni khyad par las ni gzhan brjod nas zhes bya ba ste gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
translated: The teaching of the example is also taught by the similar class. From the specific, having expressed the other, this is the specific. The other is the contradictory, this is the position of some.

original: 'grel par ni khyad par yin zhes bshad de //
analyzed: 'grel par ni khyad par yin zhes bshad de //
translated: In the commentary, it is explained as the specific.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'o //
translated: This is the contradictory.

original: spyis khyab pa ni ma yin te 'di nyid kyis gnod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i nyid can no //
analyzed: spyis khyab pa ni ma yin te 'di nyid kyis gnod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i nyid can no //
translated: It is not pervaded by the general, because this itself is harmful, this is the one with the dissimilar property.

original: gnod par 'dod pa yang rang gi tshig pham pa 'ba' zhig gi 'bras bu can yin par bstan pa ni 'bras bu'ang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnod par 'dod pa yang rang gi tshig pham pa 'ba' zhig gi 'bras bu can yin par bstan pa ni 'bras bu'ang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that the desire to harm is the result of the mere defeat of one‚Äôs own words is ‚Äúthe result.üîΩ‚Äù

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi tshig ni //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi tshig ni //
translated: The words ‚Äúgeneral‚Äù and ‚Äúparticular‚Äù

original: spyir btang ba dang dmigs kyis bsal ba'i bdag nyid smra ba po nye bar mtshon pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: spyir btang ba dang dmigs kyis bsal ba'i bdag nyid smra ba po nye bar mtshon pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: indicate that the speaker is characterized by the nature of a general statement and a specific statement.

original: thams cad nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú All‚Äù indicates that.

original: nye bar mtshon pa nyid la rmongs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de lta @264b bu ni 'ga' yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa nyid la rmongs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni de lta @264b bu ni 'ga' yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that one is not confused about the very characterization is ‚Äúthere is no such thing as.üîΩ‚Äù

original: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrubs nas rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrubs nas rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú That very thing‚Äù refers to the proof of impermanence, which is the proof of permanence.

original: gang la zhes bya ba ni smra ba po dang nyan pa po la'o //
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba ni smra ba po dang nyan pa po la'o //
translated: ‚Äú Whoever‚Äù refers to the speaker and the hearer.

original: ji ltar rung ba zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba nye bar mtshon pa'am cig shos ni khyad par dang 'gal ba yin gyi spyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rung ba zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba nye bar mtshon pa'am cig shos ni khyad par dang 'gal ba yin gyi spyi ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚Äú How is it possible?‚Äù indicates the contradiction of the characterization or the contradiction of the particular, but not of the general.

original: gsungs pa ni gnod par byed pa ste slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos de'i phyir sgra la gnas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa ni gnod par byed pa ste slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos de'i phyir sgra la gnas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The master Dignaga has said, ‚ÄúTherefore, the statement of a reason that is based on sound is not a reason, because it is contradictory to the probandum.‚Äù

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTo another‚Äù means to a contradictory one.

original: bstan pa ni sgrub byed do //
analyzed: bstan pa ni sgrub byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúStatement‚Äù means proof.

original: sgrub byed nye bar bkod pas bsgrub bya sel ba ma yin pa ni sun phyung ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub byed nye bar bkod pas bsgrub bya sel ba ma yin pa ni sun phyung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot a refutation‚Äù means that the proof is not set forth in such a way that the probandum is eliminated.

original: thams cad kyi mi rtag pa nyid ni sgra la gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi mi rtag pa nyid ni sgra la gnas pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe impermanence of all‚Äù is based on sound.

original: de las bzlog pa thams cad ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la yul gzhan la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa thams cad ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la yul gzhan la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is understood that the opposite of that is not all.

original: thams cad nyid ni gzhan la te mi rtag pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: thams cad nyid ni gzhan la te mi rtag pa nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTo another‚Äù means to impermanence, which is another object.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni thams cad ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni thams cad ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means that it is not all.

original: rjod pa ni sgra'i'o //
analyzed: rjod pa ni sgra'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúExpression‚Äù means sound.

original: sgra la thams cad ma yin pa thams cad nyid dang 'gal bar brjod na sgra ni thams cad las gzhan pa nyid du smras pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra la thams cad ma yin pa thams cad nyid dang 'gal bar brjod na sgra ni thams cad las gzhan pa nyid du smras pa yin no //
translated: If you say that sound is contradictory with all that is not all, then you are saying that sound is different from all.

original: gzhan nyid ci zhig yin zhe na /üîΩthams cad ma yin pa'i ngo bo ste thams cad ma yin pa nyid dang thams cad nyid 'gal ba yin no zhes bya bar rtogs pa yin la rtag pa nyid kyis kyang de dang khyad par mi spong ba'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan nyid ci zhig yin zhe na / thams cad ma yin pa'i ngo bo ste thams cad ma yin pa nyid dang thams cad nyid 'gal ba yin no zhes bya bar rtogs pa yin la rtag pa nyid kyis kyang de dang khyad par mi spong ba'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
translated: What is difference?üîΩIt is the nature of not being all, and not being all is contradictory with being all. And because permanence does not eliminate the difference between them, it is contradictory.üîΩSince you say that impermanence, which is contradictory, is the object of something different from sound, you are saying that sound is also different.

original: 'gal ba ste mi rtag pa nyid sgra las gzhan pa'i yul du brjod pa nyid kyi sgra yang gzhan yin no zhes brjod pa yin no zhes bya bas kyang gzhan pa nyid 'gal bas ltos nas mi rtag pa nyid yin gyi thams cad ma yin pa nyid ma
analyzed: 'gal ba ste mi rtag pa nyid sgra las gzhan pa'i yul du brjod pa nyid kyi sgra yang gzhan yin no zhes brjod pa yin no zhes bya bas kyang gzhan pa nyid 'gal bas ltos nas mi rtag pa nyid yin gyi thams cad ma yin pa nyid ma
translated: Since difference is contradictory, impermanence is dependent on that, but not being all is not dependent on that.

original: yin no ; / de'i phyir de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'gal ba ni gnas skabs de dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
analyzed: yin no ; / de'i phyir de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'gal ba ni gnas skabs de dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba can gyi'o //
translated: Therefore, the contradiction in the statement ‚ÄúIt is that, but not all of it‚Äù is that it possesses that state.

original: gzhan la ni thams cad la ste /
analyzed: gzhan la ni thams cad la ste /
translated: The other is all.

original: 'gal ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du smra bas gzhan nyid de thams cad ma yin pa nyid du brjod pa ni yin na skyon med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du smra bas gzhan nyid de thams cad ma yin pa nyid du brjod pa ni yin na skyon med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The contradiction is that the advocate of impermanence expresses difference as not all, but the fault is shown to be nonexistent.

original: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll is impermanent‚Äù is stated.

original: gzhan nyid thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyi ngo bo ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa ni gzhan nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan nyid thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyi ngo bo ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa ni gzhan nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that difference is not the nature of not all is stated because of the teaching of difference.

original: thams cad kyi sgra ni spyi'i sgra yin pa'i phyir khyad par gyi sgra 'phen par byed na /üîΩmi 'phen pa'i bdag nyid de thams @265a * //
analyzed: thams cad kyi sgra ni spyi'i sgra yin pa'i phyir khyad par gyi sgra 'phen par byed na / mi 'phen pa'i bdag nyid de thams @265a * //
translated: Because the word ‚Äúall‚Äù is a general word, if it implicates a specific word,üîΩthen how could all of that which is not of the nature of all be all?

original: cad nyid thams cad ma yin pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la spyi ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: cad nyid thams cad ma yin pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la spyi ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe general‚Äù is stated.

original: spong ba yin yang rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin te 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: spong ba yin yang rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin te 'gal ba yin la /
translated: Although it is abandoned, it is not by its own nature, because they are contradictory.

original: nges pa la ni 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa la ni 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is taught that it is definite, as in the example.

original: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos de nyid ma yin na thams cad nyid med pas thams cad nyid de yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos de nyid ma yin na thams cad nyid med pas thams cad nyid de yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By that alone, if it is not that by its own nature, then everything is not, and therefore that also is not.

original: thams cad nyid ma yin pa ma yin yang thams cad kyi ngo bo spong ba'i phyir mnyan par bya ba nyid bzhin du ldog pa'i dbye ba med pas ma grub pa yin par bstan pa ni shes bya byed shes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad nyid ma yin pa ma yin yang thams cad kyi ngo bo spong ba'i phyir mnyan par bya ba nyid bzhin du ldog pa'i dbye ba med pas ma grub pa yin par bstan pa ni shes bya byed shes bya ba'o //
translated: Although it is not everything, because it abandons the nature of everything, like audibility, there is no division of the counter-example, so it is taught to be unestablished.  The object of knowledge is the object of knowledge.

original: chos tsam grub pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i phyir de'i khyad par can gyi chos can bsgrub byar ma grub pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos tsam grub pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i phyir de'i khyad par can gyi chos can bsgrub byar ma grub pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because the mere property is established, the subject that has that as a property is not established. This is the meaning.

original: bsgrub bya'i khyad par gyi chos can so sor byas pa yang de las gzhan pa'i chos med na de grub pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i khyad par gyi chos can so sor byas pa yang de las gzhan pa'i chos med na de grub pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The difference in the property to be established is made by the individual subjects. If there is no property other than that, it is shown that it is established.

original: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example, Sound is impermanent because it is sound.

original: tshogs pa bsgrub byar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa bsgrub byar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The collection is not the property to be established.

original: zhes bya ba ni grub pa la sgrub pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni grub pa la sgrub pa nyid do //
translated: This is the establishment of what is already established.

original: de nyid rtag pa la ldog pa'i bsgrub bya dang sgra ma yin pa las log pa'i sgrub byed ma yin nam /
analyzed: de nyid rtag pa la ldog pa'i bsgrub bya dang sgra ma yin pa las log pa'i sgrub byed ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't permanence the property to be negated and sound the property to be negated as not being sound?

original: ji ltar bsgrub bya'i cha'i rjes su 'jug pa yin zhes zer ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrub bya'i cha'i rjes su 'jug pa yin zhes zer ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is it that it follows the part of the property to be established? This is what is said.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni phyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni phyis kyang ngo //
translated: Again means later on.

original: mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni grub pa nyid bzlog pa'i ched du sgra las ldog par ltung na ma grub pa kho na yin la yang brjod kyang khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / sgra nye bar dmigs pa nyid kyis de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir log par rtogs pa la rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni grub pa nyid bzlog pa'i ched du sgra las ldog par ltung na ma grub pa kho na yin la yang brjod kyang khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / sgra nye bar dmigs pa nyid kyis de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir log par rtogs pa la rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The word impermanent is a mere reversal of the word permanent, and is not established at all. And even if it were expressed, there would be no difference, because one would understand it just by the perception of the word. Thus, it is shown that in the case of mistaken understanding, the object of understanding is not attained.

original: gal te sgra nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te sgra nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: If one says, The word itself,

original: mi rtag pa'o zhes bya ba bzhin du sgra'o zhes bya ba yang grub pa'i bsgrub bya nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'o zhes bya ba bzhin du sgra'o zhes bya ba yang grub pa'i bsgrub bya nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that the word is impermanent is also an established probandum, just like the word is permanent.

original: gal te ma nges pa nyid kho nar ci'i phyir ma brjod ces zer ba la /
analyzed: gal te ma nges pa nyid kho nar ci'i phyir ma brjod ces zer ba la /
translated: If one says, Why is it not stated as just uncertain?

original: brgal zhing brtags pa la zhes bya ba ste ma grub pa nyid mdun na yod pa spangs pa ni skyon yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brgal zhing brtags pa la zhes bya ba ste ma grub pa nyid mdun na yod pa spangs pa ni skyon yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, In the case of a dispute, and the fault is that the non-establishment is abandoned in the presence of the opponent.

original: lkog tu gyur pa ste rtsod pa'i yul gyi rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa ste rtsod pa'i yul gyi rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The subject of the dispute is the hidden nature.

original: sgrub pa ni sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid bzhin du'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid bzhin du'o //
translated: The proof is like sound itself being impermanent.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa ste mngon sum pa ci las yin /
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa ste mngon sum pa ci las yin /
translated: The non-hidden, the directly perceptible, is the basis.

original: gang gi phyir rtsod pa'i yul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtsod pa'i yul ma yin pa'o //
translated: Because it is not the subject of dispute.

original: mi mthun pa zhes bya ba ni dpe zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi mthun pa zhes bya ba ni dpe zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term dissimilar means the example.

original: mar me zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid kyi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: mar me zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid kyi bshad pa'o //
translated: The term lamp is the explanation of this.

original: @265b mngon sum du grub pa kho na zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i gzhi ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: @265b mngon sum du grub pa kho na zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i gzhi ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Only the directly perceptible is not the basis of dispute.

original: sgra nyid kho na thams cad ma yin pa nyid yin te ldog pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra nyid kho na thams cad ma yin pa nyid yin te ldog pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Sound itself is not everything, and the distinction of the negation is not established, so it is not established.

original: bsgrub bya sgrub byed med pa tsam brjod par 'dod pa'i chos mi mthun pa'i dpe nyid yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub byed med pa tsam brjod par 'dod pa'i chos mi mthun pa'i dpe nyid yin te /
translated: The mere statement of the absence of the probandum and probans is itself the dissimilar example, because it is not the basis of dispute.

original: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe gzhan du mi 'thad pas btags pa nyid gtan tshigs ma yin zhing bsgrub bya nyid yin pa'i phyir thams cad ma yin pa nyid ni yan lag ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe gzhan du mi 'thad pas btags pa nyid gtan tshigs ma yin zhing bsgrub bya nyid yin pa'i phyir thams cad ma yin pa nyid ni yan lag ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: Since other dissimilar examples are not tenable, the mere designation is not a reason, but rather the probandum itself. Therefore, not all non-parts are not members,

original: grangs can pa rnams kyis yan lag pa dang bcas par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grangs can pa rnams kyis yan lag pa dang bcas par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the SƒÅ·πÉkhyas assert that they have members.

original: rgyal dpog pa rnams kyi yang yan lag can yin pa nyid dam ngo shes par bya ba nyid kyang sgrub byed ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyal dpog pa rnams kyi yang yan lag can yin pa nyid dam ngo shes par bya ba nyid kyang sgrub byed ma yin te /
translated: Also, for the Vai≈õe·π£ikas, being a whole or being an object of recognition is not a proof,

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi rjes su dpag pas gnod pa'i phyir dper na sgra rtags pa nyid la rna ba las byung bar ngo shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi rjes su dpag pas gnod pa'i phyir dper na sgra rtags pa nyid la rna ba las byung bar ngo shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: because it is undermined by the inference of impermanence, like the recognition that sound arises from the ear.

original: gang gi phyir nyams su myong ba'i 'du byed pas sad pa las dran pa dang rjes su byed pa dang sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa zhes bya ba'i rim pas sad par des pa yin te de mthong ba bzhin du mthong ba dang / snang bzhin pa ngo shes pa ni gzhan mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nyams su myong ba'i 'du byed pas sad pa las dran pa dang rjes su byed pa dang sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa zhes bya ba'i rim pas sad par des pa yin te de mthong ba bzhin du mthong ba dang / snang bzhin pa ngo shes pa ni gzhan mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: Because of the experience of the formative forces, one awakens from sleep and remembers, and in the same way that one recognizes what one has seen previously, one awakens from sleep.

original: bden med kyi de mthong ba las sad pa 'das pa'i ni ma yin te /üîΩ'o na ci zhe na nye ba'i yin te mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden med kyi de mthong ba las sad pa 'das pa'i ni ma yin te / 'o na ci zhe na nye ba'i yin te mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: One does not recognize what is seen as being different from what was seen before.üîΩOne does not awaken from the experience of the absence of true existence, but from the experience of the absence of true existence that is present.üîΩIf one says that it is the experience of the absence of true existence that is present,

original: mthong ba nyid dang nye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba nyid dang nye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: then it is not the experience of the absence of true existence that is present.

original: ma mthong ba la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were, then it would follow, absurdly, that one would also recognize what one has not seen.

original: de'i don byed pas de nyid nye ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i don byed pas de nyid nye ba yin la /
translated: It is the functioning of the object that makes it present.
